name: GameDev Life Simulator
description: In the Simulator of a game developer, you will be able to understand all the subtleties of this profession, understand how the game industry works and all the difficulties of one developer.

name: Farma Force
description: Farma Force is a 2D tower defense strategy game. You play for the side of the immune system that fights against various diseases that enter your body. Organize the protection of the body from ailments and save the most valuable thing for everyone - health!

name: Not Involved: Vermillion
description: Where is the herbalist? Can you solve this mystery without killing your new patients?

name: Glasshouse
description: A thrilling, narrative-driven survival cRPG set in a post-capitalist world in flames. Find the spy hidden in the condo, build makeshift equipment and make the ultimate choice of whether to survive the Nuclear Winter with or without your flatmates!

name: Dragon Kingdoms: A Legend's Beginning
description: Dragon Kingdoms: A Legend's Beginning is an RPG that seeks to recapture a long-gone era when games were more than just graphics and FMV cutscenes. It takes place on a world that has been nearly torn apart by a war that happened long ago, between thirteen races, of which only a few remain.

name: Grav Factor
description: Grav Factor is a built-for-VR game where you pilot a ship with 6DOF movement. Explore an underwater world to uncover its secrets, test your piloting skill in obstacle courses, and engage in both close-quarter and squad-based vehicular combat.

name: Bionic Slammer
description: Bionic Slammer is a metroidvania with a hand-drawn microscopic world, and a gameplay inspired by 2D games from the 90s. Travel through the different levels with your katana, fight nanobots and bacterias, and save the Body from destruction.

name: Small People Defense
description: An indie 3rd person tower defense game where you queue up your own difficulty. Explore the depth of this real-time strategy TD game or simply enjoy leveling up your small person into the largest in the world!

name: Aswang Detective: The Case of New York
description: You were a simple detective, but after a weird dream, you got a contract for one million dollars to find info on the Daemon-Lance corporation. After things went south, you were left for dead to come back as an Aswang. With your new demonic powers, you must solve the case and undercover the mystery!

name: Brahman: The Gate of Salvation
description: Quinn T. Cooper was sent to the island to repair the multi-dimensional gate and bring the spacetime rift under control. He has the key to the world's destiny in his hands. To stop an invasion and control the spacetime rip.

name: Gilles
description: Gilles shows the Journey of a Theather Director's 10 years exile to create his Great Work, his Theather Play named The Klown. On this first episode, join him and SamPath on their Journey to show the Great Premiere. Gilles is a story exploration game from Infiniti Studio.

name: Heartwood Heroes
description: A fast-paced board game for up to 4 players featuring humorous quests, quick turn-based combat and multiple-choice events. Explore the board, equip your character, get a job, and fight to become Hero of the Week! Play locally or online with Steam Remote Play.

name: Delivoo Delivery Sim
description: Deliver orders through the large city of Peytor Town and save enough money to open a restaurant. Make sure you're ready, as there's a lot of challenges waiting for you!

name: Isle of Leil
description: Isle of Leil: is a first person stealth horror game set on a desolate island frozen in time. Face the terrors that roam on the island. Use your wit to distract and sneak around the island. Avoid the darkness, find your parents and make it out alive!

name: The Wizard
description: The Wizard is a 2D Open World game inspired on the very good Metroidvania genre titles. Talk, Run, Explore. Find secret passages and characters and discover a Fantasy World full of magic and crazy Choo Choos ruled my a Wizard. Can you find the Choo Choo Clown before your Time runs out?

name: Small Town Detective
description: Small Town Detective is a single-player game where you need to find the killer among other citizens!

name: The Lost Uncle
description: The lost uncle is a single-player first-person adventure game with several smaller worlds filled with various stories and side activities.

name: Cyber Combat
description: Pure, unadulterated neon speed combat! Feel the adrenaline as you fight at breakneck speeds in this fast-paced minimalist movement shooter. Maneuver around Tron-like cyberarenas with your grappling hook, taking advantage of your momentum to bring pain to your enemies with a powerful arsenal.

name: Dawn of Griseo
description: A medium-length visual novel set in a fantasy world where magic exists. The encounter between a boy living in a rural farming village and a girl who is a dark wizard leads to the revelation of truths that were never meant to be revealed.

name: Toon Team
description: Choose your fighter and team. Decide who's tougher. Play with friends. In one of the many game modes: Team Deathmatch, One vs. All, Capture the Flag, Defend the Base from the Enemy.

name: Strong Protection
description: Strong Protection - This is a mixture of genres, real-time strategy and base defense, with a top-down view. The goal is to fight off opponents who are trying to destroy your base. Destroy them to earn money to build units, towers and fortifications. Hold on as long as you can!

name: Dungeon Cleaner
description: Dungeon Cleaner is a rogue.lite focused on a fast game Flow, a dynamic combat system and the strategic use of the environment.

name: Super Block Crush
description: Super block crash is a new Breakout game, with a sprinkle of RPG.

name: Hoshimago
description: Who said ink war is reserved to squids and octopus?! In Hoshimago, change the world's color with or against your friends.

name: Unrushed Defence
description: Unrushed Defense - 2D tower defense strategy. Manage your castle, build defensive towers, upgrade them or sell them, fight off waves of enemies at the first opportunity and conquer all the lands! Prove to all the evil spirits of this forest the indestructibility and purity of your noble goal!

name: Tobi Topples Tyranny
description: Take a lovely stroll through a highly unstable police state. Strike it rich in a lawless wasteland. Pay respects to the elderly in glorious hand-to-hand combat! Prepare your circuits, adventure awaits!

name: Pin City
description: Pin City is a VR bowling game with the spirit of mini-golf! Silly, yet challenging, strive for a perfect game and explore the bowling alley!

name: Down With Fear
description: Down With Fear: is a single-player survival horror game set in the 90s in a military hospital. Your goal is to overcome the enemys who are waiting there for you by hide from them, find items that reveal you new paths and by some enemys there is no other option but to run away to survive!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Finland
description: Puzzles of Finland!

name: Sucker for Love: Date to Die For
description: Put the 'love' in 'Lovecraftian horror!' Hide from cultists and survive dangerous rituals to find a way out of the Black Woods!

name: Sands
description: "The sands have no pity." The inhabitants of Zetta-115 often say that. The same they instill in their children from an early age. And this is what they whisper about, sitting in their dilapidated shacks, waiting for the impending storm...

name: Metal Punch
description: I wanted to make a game, so I did. This game is a 2D action game, hope you enjoy it

name: Candyboy
description: Make it through Halloween in this NES inspired, candy filled adventure!

name: Epic Dragon
description: Epic Dragon is an arcade-style game in which the player controls the Dragon Faby (Endless Game) , which moves persistently to the right. The player is tasked with navigating Faby through pairs of pipes that have equally sized gaps placed at random heights.

name: Cockville
description: Congrats, you just inherited a farm and your hot neighbors will not let you be! Erotic hijinks ensue on your neverending quest to expand your farm! Discover spicy romances and intertwining stories in this bizarrely relaxing farm simulator.

name: One Armed Bandit
description: Spin to win in this colorful casino-themed, slot-machine-building roguelike!

name: Hack the System
description: Hack the System is an isometric, narrative puzzle. In a dark dystopian country, you have to investigate the conspiracy behind your missing sister by hacking computer networks.

name: Seekers of Sahul
description: Seekers of Sahul is a traditional Mystery Dungeon roguelite with monster taming, inspired by cult classic Azure Dreams. Explore the Pyramid of Sahul with your favorite monsters, befriend other adventurers and expand the town as you try to uncover the greatest secret in history.

name: Farm in Another World
description: Farm in another world tells about the events of a young man born in another world. A World where you can be agriculture, warrior or fisherman! It's up to you to complete this disappearance story! Don't forget to get along with the people in town!

name: Sisypush
description: Play as Sisyphus in the ancient Greek underworld pushing his rock towards the goal in this short Sokoban-like puzzle game with a monochromatic art style.

name: Bucko
description: Adventure with your friends a hand crafted open world inspired by pirate tales! Sails the seas, explore dangerous islands, plunder your enemies' booty, gather treasures, and build your hideout. Stay on your guard, some pirate legends.. may not be just legends!

name: Endless Monday: Dreams and Deadlines
description: "Endless Monday: Dreams and Deadlines" - In this short branching visual novel story, Penny, a mild-mannered corporate grunt, pulls an all-nighter at the office in an effort to finish her project on time while overcoming distractions from coworkers, space aliens, imaginary friends, and herself.

name: Poosh XL
description: Poosh XL is a neon-infused, one-button arcade score chaser. That's it! That pretty much says it all. If you like that first sentence you'll probably enjoy this game. (The spiritual successor to Ding Dong XL)

name: Hell Dungeons: The Lost Soul
description: Hell Dungeons, The Lost Souls is a dungeon maze game for you who like challenges and constantly overcome yourself. Whether it's after a stressful day at work and/or studies, it's a great game to relax and let go of all day-to-day tensions.

name: Backrooms Descent
description: If you are not careful enough, you may end up in that place, the place some call The Backrooms. The Backrooms of existence, a hellish dimension of infinite maze-like constructs, each level pushing deeper into the despair. Could you, a normal person find the way out? Dive deeper into the horror

name: Find the Murderer 3
description: A young man has disappeared from his apartment. Detective Silantyev begins to investigate the case

name: Strangers World: The Swarm
description: Go Alone or join your friends and together rid the world of interdimensional mutant creatures

name: Tales of Vogar: Lost Descendants
description: Go on an emotional adventure in the kingdom of Vogar, a once beautiful land filled with magic but now devastated by war. Discover the secrets behind the Ascension, reclaim your homeland and take revenge in this story-driven RPG with a turn-based battle system. Free the people of Vogar from tyranny!

name: The Last Saviour: Search of Truth
description: You woke up as a test subject in an empty, deserted place. Here begins the study of the mysterious sequoia forest, where there are many mysteries, fantasy, wild animals. With the onset of night, there will be a meeting with the "Great", who will lead you to truth and death.

name: Covenant: Project Zero
description: A sci-fi action adventure space opera set on the borders of the universe governed by interstellar corporations and big money interest. Lead a rag-tag crew of misfits, solve problems and fight for your life on a voyage that will put you at odds with an ancient evil that lurks in the shadows.

name: Undertunnel
description: Leaving the dystopian metropolis behind, a strange & dangerous journey lies ahead. You must venture into the depths of the sprawling Neo-industrial tunnels below. Weirdos, Gangs, Mutants, Machines, Traps, Humour & More awaits, as you make your way through... Undertunnel.

name: Elder Trial
description: Elder Trial is a Rougelike ARPG game with Customizable Abilities,each Ability has a variety of Customizable Enhancement Options,and it can also Super Evolution!The game also has a large number of Weapons,Amulets,Random Events…You can have fun every time you play the game!

name: Scree
description: Scree is a roguelike shooter in a physics sandbox. Discover creative ways to fight through swarms of hostiles and outrun the supernova.

name: Beauty from Wisdom
description: After some brainstorming, although you are a little tired, enjoying the beautiful scenery may relax you.

name: Journeyman
description: Journeyman is a 1-10 player co-op ARPG/CRPG hybrid featuring Souls-inspired combat, deep character customization, classes, talent trees, and endless procedural dungeon content. Descend as far as your gear and grit will take you, or perfect your build in online PvP.

name: Rose
description: Sacrifice your flesh and blood for new weapons and abilities. Slaughter waves of monstrous enemies and titanic bosses in procedurally changing arenas or die trying, upgrade your abilities and return to the fight ever stronger!

name: Overrider
description: Take on a high speed hoverboard adventure through a post-apocalyptic world and stop an AI robot invasion.

name: The Specter Chronicles: Episode 1 - The False Prophet
description: The Specter Chronicles is a cyberpunk visual novel that combines text-based adventure with turn-based tactical combat.

name: Cloud: Telos
description: A young man is among the chosen few to replace God. However, in order to save the world from falling into oblivion, he must overpower those who strive for the title of godhood themselves! Experience the tale of the new gospel along with a host of eccentric characters and decide the future!

name: My Grandparents' Christmas Mystery
description: Grandma never showed up and Grandpa's tragic passing 3 days later left me in anger, confusion and sadness. I couldn't just let this go like it never happened, so I decided to go and find out what happened on my own. Will you survive a first-person psychological horror game and uncover the mystery?

name: Hentai 15 Puzzle 2
description: Hentai 15 Puzzle is a casual puzzle game. Rearrange the panels to complete the illustration! Complete the puzzles and get high-quality sexy images and animations of beautiful girls! You can view the images and animations you have obtained at any time in gallery mode.

name: Mr. Mower
description: Get mowing in this challenging top-down lawn mowing simulator. Traverse lawns that need a good mow down while avoiding an array of obstacles standing in your way. Help out your creator Hane finally complete a project by pushing trough and becoming the best mower you can be fo her.

name: The Orphanage
description: Zack has a simple choice.. Run. Escape. Survive. With lots of puzzles to solve, Keys to find, Puzzle items to obtain to help progress through the game to lead to your escape. Will you live to tell the tale of JJ Randalls Orphanage?

name: Southern Legends: The Temple Defenders
description: Master the arcane arts of magic and mow down hundreds of dark spawns. Defend the ancient temple and its treasures till dawn! Temple Defenders is a casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can mean either you will survive or perish the night. Gather gold and upgrade your skills/stats.

name: Stack World
description: Stack World is a physics puzzle game. Place all the given blocks and make sure they do not fall off the screen before the countdown timer hits 0. Enjoy over 100 levels of gameplay and use the level editor to create your own levels. Compete for the fastest times on the leaderboards.

name: Escape Dream
description: Help the character trapped in a dream to escape and go to work next day!

name: Last Memories
description: Dark short story about a girl who went travel with her father. This a point & click adventure that includes a deep plot with several endings.

name: Ace of Spades
description: Use your investigating skills to solve Zephyr City’s most heinous crimes through the eyes of infamous detective Nick Spade. This steampunk noir city is a rats nest of secrets and lies. Do you have what it takes to earn the title The Ace of Spades?

name: Mountain Madness
description: Mountain Madness is a chilled, stylized role playing game where you lead a team of climbers and helpers as they travel towards the summit of mountains around the world!

name: Bat Hero
description: Equipped with your favorite weapon of choice, a Bat, embark in a whole new adventure with this brand new arcade action game and defeat the great evil that lurks in the shadows gathering new powers along the way. Ready ? Swing Away !

name: Hogvalord: The Ranch
description: Play as a fresh graduated hogmaster and manage your own ranch in a remote and desolated land. Collect different types of hogragon egg, raise them up, let everyone in the kingdom know how adorable these mythical beings are. Build houses and workshops, design this ranch to your heart's content!

name: Breakout Force
description: Breakout Force is a culmination of quirky block-breaking games greatly inspired by Nights into Dreams and like-minded games from the 90s. Rack up points, maximize chains all before the timer runs out. The game will put your tactical and twitch reflex skills to the test, all in strobing Arcady style.

name: A Dream That Never Wakes Up
description: In the game, the character manipulated by the player has an infinite bullet weapon.

name: Cook Fest
description: Create and design your own complex maze by strategizing your festival spaces! Cook and serve dishes to satisfy your customers. Level up to unlock to new ingredients and recipes. With unexpected roguelite elements and fast-paced gameplay, you can play solo or in chaotic co-op with your fellow chef!

name: Crystal Riders VR
description: Test your archery skills in this action-packed virtual reality reimagination of the endless runner genre. Immerse yourself in diverse landscapes, shoot tornadoes out of a bow, battle giant dragons, and much more in this progressively chaotic adventure. How far can you get?

name: Project Planet: Earth Vs. Humanity
description: Will you save your fellow humans, or destroy them as planet Earth? Impossible dilemmas and branching narratives create countless paths through cataclysmic disasters. Work with and against your friends in this 1v5 serious party game.

name: Tachyons: Battles Across the Galaxy
description: Tachyons is a multiplayer spaceship simulation roguelike, where you and your friends take roles as crew on a space ship, battling your way through a randomly generated galaxy, fighting off pirates and alien threats.

name: Kingdom Islands
description: Kingdom Islands is a medieval city-building game, where you construct a prosperous city on a distant island. As your village expands and your people begin to develop their knowledge of the land, you may explore and visit new areas of the known world.

name: Doug's Nightmare
description: Doug's Nightmare is a bullet hell dungeon crawler with countless opponents, weapons, skins and quests.

name: Burning Secrets: A Bara Visual Novel
description: In one of Zafir's expeditions, the old wizard disappears and Fin decides to rescue him with Luxus's help. Embark on this journey in Luxus' shoes and have the opportunity to fall in love with one of them playing this short visual novel with multiple endings - including a polyamorous one.

name: Sumtune
description: Sumtune is an application that can mix the input voice with chosen audio sources and play it out in different applications, so your friends can hear it in real-time.

name: Lifetime
description: Awakening in a land among the stars, play as a cat exploring The Cosmic Island of Recollection in this Third-person open world visual novel in order to regain memories of the life that came before. Search behind rocks, in the grass, and everywhere in-between to discover all 13 memories.

name: Neanderthallica
description: The fun adventure puzzle-metroidvania in which you can change the weather to affect everything in a prehistoric world.

name: Durka Simulator
description: Durka Simulator is a visual novel where you are waiting for adventure and mystery.You as the main player are being sought to take away your power.You and mysterious must not let them catch you!With you will always be your friends as a lemur named Zina, Mysterious and Larry

name: Timekeepers Battleground
description: Challenge the Timekeepers in a series of strategic, auto-resolved mini-battles, unfolding as an epic campaign throughout history. Bolster your units, use your time machine to adapt your board and look for opportunities each round, as the time-ages progress and your deck shuffles!

name: Fincester Tower
description: Overcome the dark and dangerous depths of Fincester Tower and piece together the truth of this world the deeper you go. Prepare, adapt and survive in this Hardcore, Roguelite First Person Dungeon Crawler inspired by the many greats of the early 2000’s.

name: Anthro Heat
description: Anthro Heat is a VR sandbox where you can sexually interact with anthro characters in numerous ways! You can lick, grab, suck, fuck, use toys, explore fetishes and much more! Immerse yourself in this virtual world where you have very special characters at your disposal any time!

name: Wuxian
description: This is an independent game! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can enjoy it! It's definitely worth it!

name: ToyBox Puzzle
description: These toys are all over the place! Arrange and organize the mess by fitting everything inside the grid in this relaxing and colorful puzzle game with over 100 levels that will test your critical thinking skills.

name: Vector Wave
description: Drop-in, pick-up powerful weapons and blast your friends into the void in this 2.5D party platform shooter, where the bullets don’t hurt, but the knockback does!

name: Lumien
description: Lumien is a fast-paced third-person platformer in which you explore the ruins of an ancient civilization and breathe life back into it. On your way past the various defenses, you'll be helped by the Orbs, fueled by the mysterious powers of the civilization.

name: Dearg
description: Having just picked her sister, Amelia and Alanna drive through the Scottish forests when it starts to rain hard. Stressed and angry from the storm, they get into a heated argument when something suddenly appears in the road and causes them to crash.

name: Dungeon King
description: Dungeon King is a turn-based adventure puzzle. Player should smash all enemies on tile based map avoiding traps and plan his moves ahead.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Fantasy 2
description: Fantasy images!

name: Chinese SimpleLife
description: Chinese SimpleLife is a living environment simulation.

name: Speluncaphobia
description: A retro-inspired horror game where you play through different 'stories' of cavers that went missing.

name: Towers, Turrets, Turtles
description: Build and upgrade mazes of turrets to Defend your computer tower from the Pea Horde in this bright and colourful Tower Defence!

name: Escape: Left to die
description: In the deepest and darkest place on Earth no one can hear your scream.

name: Star Mercenary
description: This is a 3D top-down shooting game with a huge open universe. You can drive a spaceship to find planets in need of help throughout the galaxy, help them destroy enemies, and earn your commission. Recruit team members, upgrade combat skills, and develop into a powerful interstellar mercenary group.

name: Ordinary Day
description: In this not so ordinary psychological horror you must chose which path you take, your soul bound from birth to a demonic entity that's awaiting the day it can rebirth. Will you be the puppet it wants you to be or will you defy your destiny and rid yourself of the curse?

name: Redumption
description: Redumption is an action adventure game where you explore a town consumed by the waste. Fight bosses and retrieve precious items to save your friends from the witch's curse. Can you clean up the town and achieve redumption?

name: Arms Race 2
description: Arms Race 2 is PC strategy game based on the historical conflict between the USA and the USSR taken place in 20th century.

name: Ansoku
description: Ansoku is a relaxing, fun, simple, and yet challenging puzzle game with a high replay value.

name: Star Hive: The Menace
description: When humanity arrived on Mars, another civilization had arrived first. Then everyone knew that an invasion was imminent. Despite welcome preparations (a defense fleet with a freighter packed with missiles!), can humanity survive such an advanced invading horde?

name: GourdsTown
description: In an unfamiliar world, full of gourds, you are left to discover the struggles of living in this tiny town, in the middle of nowhere, with little resources you will need to uncover how to be useful, these town-gourds will need your help. In this adventure into the odd world of GourdsTown

name: Whispers of Gold
description: Step into the world of Whispers of Gold, a choice-driven mystery adventure visual novel! Navigate the medieval free city as hired dagger Arthur on a quest to find a nobleman’s abducted daughter.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Elves
description: From glittering white cities to hidden woodland outposts, the last remnants of elfkind are ever-vigilant against the growing darkness.

name: Military Division
description: MilitaryDivision is a 2D side-scrolling platform shooter. A large terrorist group has taken over the area of the city. You are the last remaining of your detachment, the liberators. Destroy the enemies and make it out of the area alive.

name: Scout Duty
description: Scout Duty - Top Down View is a game in which you need to direct the attacks of allies behind enemy lines. Be careful not to get hit yourself. The victory of the allies depends on your work.

name: Light of Alariya
description: Light of Alariya is an open-world, third-person, exploration puzzle game in which you traverse ancient alien temples and ruins to restore the power of the stars and awaken your sleeping civilization.

name: Monster Shopper
description: The Monster Market is back open! Use automation to assemble monster parts into the proper monsters, and keep your customers happy. A fun, relaxing, and challenging puzzle game where you have full control over how difficult it gets.

name: Clausum
description: Clausum is a first person psychological horror game that delivers a terrifying and immersive experience. Solve puzzles, explore different locations and discover true horrors. You have nothing to defend yourself and the house is looking for the next victim.

name: Magic Corgi
description: Magic Corgi - 2D arcade game. A precision platformer in which it is worth trying to complete each of the 10 levels, because all of them are stuffed with various obstacles that can injure a harmless dog!

name: Chaos Storm: Strategy Edition
description: Chaos Storm: Strategy Edition is a magic style tower defense strategy game. You will be the leader of a specific camp, strengthen your power through constant battle, defend your strongholds, and constantly expand your territory, eventually becoming the ruler of the whole world.

name: Cats and Sokoban: Mimi's Scratcher
description: Move boxes, jump on everything in sight, Mimi loves challenges like jumping long distances. Help her reach her scratcher!

name: Empty Shell
description: Empty Shell will throw you in a dark industrial environment, a secret facility on a japanese island. Each volunteer has signed a contract for a "recovery operation" without being privy to too many details. A tense roguelite survival horror with a top down perspective.

name: Kapital Punishment 22XX
description: Battle relentless cyborg police in a grim 23rd century dystopia. Experience fast-paced, bloody combat in this retro-inspired beat-'em up, action platformer. Recruit comrades and collect upgrades as you traverse hazardous environs to reach KAPITAL and take down the oligarchs in charge!

name: Mindless Breakpoint
description: Mindless Breakpoint is a first person horror adventure with puzzles and some action elements. The game is set inside a huge mental asylum in which terrible things have happened.

name: The Cursed Knight
description: The Cursed Knight is an action / platform / shoot‘em up game, based on a « die and retry » style and made with love and passion to pay tribute to the games made in the 90s.

name: Fingerbang: All Bullets Pointin'
description: Fingerbang: All Bullets Pointin' is a fast-paced FPS inspired by both retro and modern FPS games. Fingerbang combines elements from each in order to create a mix of its own, with a scoring system added on top to gauge your performance through the different levels.

name: Dropoff Dealer
description: Escape the police and cause endless destruction!!

name: Oathbound: Arena
description: Turn-based tactical PvP combat with high-fantasy RPG units. Meet Oathbound: Arena. This stand-alone PvP play mode of the upcoming MMORPG Oathbound lets you experience the core combat mechanics in engaging 1v1 online battles. Rally your oath-bound units and lead them all to victory!

name: Ozymandias: The World
description: Including a new map: The World!

name: Vampiric Tower Remix
description: A puzzle game where you can fly around as a bat and try not to get zapped by pumpkins.

name: Valley of the Old Masters
description: The World has been in the midst of the winds of change. As a wandering artist, you end up in a mystical valley on your journey. Do you find inspiration for your art there?

name: Trailmakers: Airborne Expansion
description: A whole new campaign focused on the skies. Face the very first Trailmakers enemies in this expansion and enjoy new blocks, mechanics and missions.

name: Factory Trashcension
description: Factory Trashcension is a first-person open-world factory creation and optimization game with unlimited possibilities. Play with your friends and design efficient factories to Trashscend without worries and explore a vaporwave inspired universe!

name: EarthRemnant
description: EarthRemnant is a sandbox simulation game in which you will lead the Keplerians to land and build a colony on a strange planet, develop the planet's mineral resources, collect fossil, wind, solar and other energy sources to keep the colony running, and continuously increase the colony's population.

name: As Guilty As the Moon
description: This is a realistic + survival oriented work. The murder of a girl in a ride-hailing service two years ago, brought your 12 fates back together. You wake up in a strange room, and things are getting weird around you. In the fog, not everything you see is the truth. Is everything real or unreal?

name: Party Shift
description: Get ready to party with your friends! Party Shift is a 2-8 player online party game where you will laugh, cheer and test your skills with our collection of exciting and unique minigames. For a night of endless entertainment and plenty of absurdity, grab your friends and shift into party mode.

name: ZigZagging Ski
description: Do you remember the last time you were on vacation?

name: Don't Wake God
description: Take on the role of Tieface - a dream figment, whose goal is to prevent his dreamer from waking up - if he wakes up, you die! Acquire abilities, outsmart your enemies, and most importantly... Don't Wake God.

name: Frayspace
description: Frayspace is a fast-paced local multiplayer space shooter with destructible maps, where up to 4 players can compete in muItiple game modes. It features several space fighters with different characteristics, and lots of weapons and power-ups that the players can learn to use for their advantage.

name: Nitrous Firetruck
description: Response time from this fire department has been slacking recently, so Nitrous Oxide has been installed on the firetruck. Located directly in between two cities, this firehouse is responsible for responding to fire calls at both cities and putting out the fires.

name: Metal Ascension
description: Metal Ascension is a horde survival game with rogue-lite elements. Upgrade your mech with over 200 pieces and more than 1 000 000 combinations.

name: Girl Fantasy
description: "Girl Fantasy" is a visual novel with a theme of youth. It tells the love story of the woman who went to play with the man during the summer vacation and stayed at the man's house, then moved the man with "sincerity" step by step, and finally stayed with the man.

name: Beau & Bow
description: Beau & Bow! A game about two sweethearts going on a lighthearted adventure. Best platforming challenges and solve puzzles! This game is inspired by handheld platformers from the late '80s and early '90s. Beau & Bow! A great introduction for those new to the platforming genre.

name: In the Backrooms
description: "God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you.."

name: Drag the Dead
description: A mind virus has taken hold of the population! Assume the role of drag-queen--zombie-slayer extraordinaire Zane Dmaaj and battle your way through mobs of NPZees, Fatties, SoiBois and more in the high octane, pearl clutching shooter Drag the Dead!

name: GeraScopia
description: When lost in the Depths, the only way to go is up. You will Escape- one way or another.

name: The Hero's Journey Through Time
description: On your journey you will meet a wide variety of heroes who are as different as fire and ice. You will meet brave warriors who risk their lives for their beliefs, but also benevolent magicians who use their powers for the good of others.

name: Kayak League
description: Kayak League is a fast-paced, physics-driven party royale game where you compete through various types of stylized courses, competing to be the last one standing!

name: Awakening: Into the Stars
description: Become the one and only Captain of the Colony Ship Oberon as it cruises towards the Planet Zaenus with a single goal in mind: to colonise it and make it into a brand-new home for humanity. Such a huge task might seem daunting, but don’t worry, for you are not alone on your journey...

name: Army Troop
description: Army Troop is an old-school PvP World War 2 online first-person shooter. Reminding you of the good old days World War games.

name: Balance 100
description: This game requires controlling your hands to cure that slight OCD, Maybe occasionally drive you crazy, But don't worry. You'll probably be able to do it.

name: Elemental Survivors: Roguelike
description: Fight off hordes of enemies, slay Bosses, choose from a variety of upgrades and combine your spells to create unique and game-breaking builds In this auto-attacking roguelite.

name: Beneath Her Starry Sky
description: A fantasy/adventure visual novel - as Freya Fae, track down the master assassin Orick Genn before he brings ruin to your home city. Rely on faithful companions and make friends with the citizens as you encounter dangers lurking through the streets.

name: IDentity Rebels
description: Online Open World RPG Shooter accompanied by a captivating story. Filled with an array of encounters ranging from Terrifying to Heroic!

name: KaiJu Girls
description: Kaiju Girls is a Visual Novel full of Monster Girls. The protagonist lost his memory in an accident and became a KaijuTamer, with the Kaiju girls in the Kaiju world full of danger adventure! In the wonderful and exciting adventure journey in the protagonist will slowly recall his memories.

name: Corduroy Hollow
description: Corduroy Hollow is a first-person survival horror game set in a decrepit mansion tainted by evil and the occult. Discover the truth. Escape the mansion. Above all, fear the Corduroy Demon…and survive.

name: Grow Your Pets
description: You found a mysterious egg. By deciding to open it, your life has changed forever. Now you are the Pet Grower. Everyone thinks that all these creatures are extinct. But you know that there is someone, who chose exactly you. Wander through the forest, fish for food, upgrade pets. This is your world!

name: Rune Monsters
description: A monster collector RPG that features over 100 monsters of 18 different types.

name: Ratopia
description: New game with combined genre of strategic survival, Sandbox, and city building simulation. Enjoy the simulation with vast world to adventure with a great number of contents. Build your own economical system to sustain your ideal city of Ratopia.

name: Whispers in the Moss
description: Whispers in the Moss is a retro JRPG with some of the most beautiful and detailed text-based graphics you've ever seen. Experience an epic story, a fun turn-based battle system, and a full custom soundtrack.

name: The Futanati
description: Sin descripción

name: Bingo Girl
description: Bingo Girl is a puzzle filling game. The numbers of calling numbers are randomly selected within 1-75. Players can quickly find these numbers on the card and make marks according to the calling numbers. As long as the marked number complies with the award rules, win.

name: Slipgate
description: Explore a gloomy rooms of damned sci-fi base as a doomed marine, only survivor of the portal experiment. Save humanity like in 90's with your trusty shotgun, paving a way through ominous corridors inhabited by the shadows of sinners and evil spirits.

name: Shit Clicker
description: Shit Clicker is a clicker game about destroy the world with an overload of poop, if you are tired of this shit world, you can destroy him with your own shit.

name: Little Eternal Chronicle
description: Manipulate time! Let's do mischief! Helpless 10 year olds are given only one weapon: a clock. This world will soon be destroyed...

name: Altered Algorithm
description: Altered Algorithm is an action-thriller VR experience blending the craft of film and games in a new way. In this story-driven game set in a futuristic 1983 LA, your playground will be detective work, head-to-head combat, and the ability to DYNAMICALLY interact with full motion video characters.

name: Monster Racing League
description:
Multiplayer combat racing, with no driving!

Monster Racing League is a madcap multiplayer racing game made for maximum fun.
Let your monster drive while you activate offensive and defensive abilities to foil your rivals.

name: Sleight of Hand: Dominion
description: A realm torn by war. Muster an army and combat your enemies on the battlefield in this epic card game. Play your hand right and claim your spoils of war.

name: EthrA
description: EthrA is an RPG/Adventure and open world game that revolves around the misadventures of two characters: Bob and Veil. Both will explore the land of EthrA and uncover a thousand year lie the world already forgot about.

name: Rabat Protocol: Metal Rhapsody
description: Join the guerrilla and take down the enemies on your vehicle in this 3D third-person shooting game! Gain EXP and upgrades by defeating enemies, choose new weapons and combat skills. Use gold gained from battles to buy tactical packs and combine them into your own combo and beat the enemies!

name: Furry Sweeper
description: Furry Sweeper is a variant of minesweeper where a beautiful, naked furry girls help you on your journey to become incredibly smart by solving puzzles. The girls will moan and masturbate to help you focus on the puzzle and come up with ideas on how to solve it more quickly.

name: Tostchu
description: A slow-burn atmospheric horror game about managing a toast shop in a desolate location in Central Anatolia, Turkey. Make toasts for customers, cash in, buy more ingredients, and witness strange events unfolding.

name: Space Guardians
description: Space Guardian is a Koop-Roguelike, with Tower-Defense Elements. Upgrade your Base, Upgrade your Player, survive as long as you can!

name: Miss Lu
description: Miss Lu is a lovely girl. After the encounter in the game, she yearns for it all the time!

name: At the Dream End
description: After mind transfer into a body of a young wolf-human hybrid, you set out to stop a person on the verge of destroying our planet. A person addressed as Butcher.

name: Remnant Protocol
description: The assassination of the Blessed Mother has plunged the galaxy in darkness. Usurpers rule with absolute authority, and blood flows in rivers of red across the stars. Only the Protocol can restore Her light.

name: Cloud House
description: Cloud House is a revival of a physical location of a performing arts space, Centre 42 within the digital realm. It features both an interactive multiplayer world as well as a single-player theatrical experience titled 'Love Letters to 42'.

name: Zotenhold
description: A massive open world online survival Co-Op Pvp wave-based medieval fantasy. Start with nothing - work your way up to build fortresses against the hordes of enemies or raid other warriors to obtain more loot. Enemies grow stronger in power each night. Choose your journey wisely.

name: Ice Nosfe
description: Help the Van Helsing brothers defeat Nosfe in the lands of Transylvania. Use the freeze rifle to defeat the bosses in each dungeon. 10 dungeons await you guarded by Nosfe and his hosts. NES or Commodore style. Solo and cooperative.

name: I Love Finding Birds
description: Your new feathered friends are taking you to the sky!

name: Convenient Encounters
description: You never know what might happen on a casual visit to a concenience store! Play through this erotic roleplaying game to find out! Experience the story, Interact with characters and environments, unlock new scenes based on your choices...

name: A Slime and a Civil War
description: Go through a world where every living being is a slime and take down the slime dictator in this 2D side-scrolling action game. Discover the secrets of a world no more on your journey.

name: Crystal Squad
description: Crystal Squad is a top-view story-driven twin-stick shooter. Choose one of 4 characters to find the villagers that have been kidnapped. Use a modular weapon that provides varying gameplay depending on the pieces you combine. Play with friends or play alone as you discover the world in Crystal Squad.

name: Zoolovelogy
description: Pair up all animals with one of their own type to beat each puzzle level. Explore and utilize the unique traits of each animal type, tile, and object to find the optimal solution and earn all 3 stars! Make and share your own puzzles using the handy in-game editor.

name: Void Blitzing
description: Void Blitzing is a top-down action roguelite set in space with randomized levels and a challenging movement system. Fight over 18 unique enemies, Upgrade your ship, Modify your weapons and survive.

name: Take Care VR
description: They are here. Face the darkest horror in this stunning new survival adventure! Follow the path of a mysterious woman and take the challenge of your life. Fight your way through creepy zombie hordes or solve the puzzles to succeed.

name: Maya's Dream
description: Solve the puzzle of her memory and bring a lost chapter of her life, back to life. Immerse yourself in her story and unravel the mystery of a stranger's recollections. As you piece together her memories, you'll discover how they connect us all, in a captivating and emotional journey.

name: Eternal Seas
description: Eternal seas is an open world pirate RPG inspired by classic pirate games, set in a fictional island region. Command mighty vessels and lead your crew across the high seas and through lush jungles. Will you find fortune or will your soul be damned to sail the seas eternally?

name: Blightseeker
description: Jump and dash through unknown, labyrinthine worlds in this VR adventure. Fight back against maddened creatures, or cure them of the blight that fuels their rage. Collect treasures, tools, and powers as you search for the source of this ancient ill, and decide whether to quell or unleash it.

name: Naive Riri
description: Naïve Riri is a match 3 game. You need to go through many interesting levels, breaking power crystals and rescuing girls from Evil! You will see fun and addictive gameplay, beautiful music and incredible anime style!

name: Flyghts
description: Welcome to the world of Flies! Crazy, microscopic and insanely dangerous. Join the online gameplay as a member of one of two teams of four players who will meet in battle on detailed hand-drawn maps.

name: Summer Village
description: A platform game in a charming medieval setting. Control a hero who jumps to overcome obstacles. Evolve your hero by looking for armor, shields and swords that make him stronger. As an extra challenge, try to find the hidden artifacts scattered throughout the world.

name: Grief Trigger
description: Inspired by my own grief journey, join Azrael and The Ghost on an indie adventure to put grief in a grave. Explore your hometown for grief triggers that distorted memories of your late father. Survive the bullet hells and puzzles inside to make those memories nostalgic again instead of painful.

name: Project Labyrinth
description: Join your friends in a 2D online multiplayer board game experience. Slide tiles around the board to make paths and collect goals and power-ups. Use the board to mess with your opponents, and take you to victory.

name: Dungeons and Raids
description: Dungeons and Raids is a gacha game where you will collect heroes and make them fight in the dungeons...

name: Candy Tycoon
description: Do you want to manage your own candy brand? Compete with other candy brands around the world by selling different candies in your own built store. Reach more customers by customizing your store and improving your confectionery. Remember, more customers means more revenue!

name: TraumaCore Violence
description: TraumaCore Violence is a 2D Character Action Game with a focus on intense, snappy combat and in-depth movement mechanics; set within the psyche of a woman who has just had her life broken.

name: Mind Diver
description: Restore a broken mind to solve a twisted case. Investigate a couple's most intimate moments and piece together the events of a fateful night. Pick what to investigate, deduce awful truths, and solve a dark mystery. But most of all, Mind Diver: find the lost love. Before it's too late.

name: Now You Are the Persecuted
description: You spawn in a dungeon that hasn't loaded yet and for some reason the other enemies (apart from you) want to attack you and you have to escape before they reach you (there could be many bugs).

name: Christmas Luge
description: The penguins in the villages below need some Christmas cheer! Slide your way down the snowy mountains, gathering scarves along the way, and toss them to penguins in need.

name: Crowd Medieval City War
description: Fight with medieval soldiers in a fantastic city.

name: Web Crawlies
description: Web Crawlies - Due to a Lab Accident at the Pesticide Factory, All of the pests on Earth have grown 100 times their normal size, and the air is toxic to humans. You and your team are the last remaining people, can you survive?

name: Final Factory
description: Final Factory blends factory building with a rich universe to explore. Build a vast network of automated space stations and command a massive fleet against the hostile local aliens. Discover new technologies and unlock the secrets of an ancient civilization as you explore an infinite cosmos.

name: Dungeon Walk: Ryuumeikyuu no Kanrisha
description: Sin descripción

name: Night Run
description: Night Run is a procedurally generated night time city driving game. Drive, listen to music and look at generative art in the city landscape. The game is designed to be a hypnotic, relaxing and aesthetic experience.

name: Gilded Destiny
description: Gilded Destiny is a grand strategy game depicting the transformative era of the Industrial Revolution. You will take the helm of the country of your choice and transform it from a backward agrarian society to an industrial powerhouse.

name: Project Backrooms
description: Project Backrooms is a 1-4 player exploration game. Explore the subluminal space known as the Backrooms avoiding entitles, puzzle solving, and discovering new levels. Free content updates with new levels, entities, etc.

name: Gladiator's Arena
description: Gladiator's Arena is a top-down arena shooter rogue-lite where you play as a gladiator wielding up to 7 different medieval weapons to fight off hordes of enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades and abilities to create unique builds.

name: Bubble Troops
description: Blue Alien is the main hero. When he destroy an enemy, his health and score will increase. But if the enemy bullet hit the blue alien, his health will decrease. Also each enemy's character and bullet damage is different.

name: Kanzo
description: Kanzo offers a unique third-person action: fast-paced, savage combat, and an unique setting that mixes science fiction with cyberpunk theme. It tells the story of a world that has as of now finished and its tenants who battle to outlive.

name: The Secrets of Hope
description: Lose yourself in an immersive story, as you follow a man coming to terms with terminal cancer. Explore a surreal world from a first-person perspective. Revisit both new and old memories and follow along as he discovers The Secrets of Hope.

name: Cakez TD
description: Get ready to Level up, train Skills, craft Items and build your perfect team to counter smart hordes of enemies. In this 2D Tower Defense game your Skills will be tested to the Limit!

name: Anubis Clicker
description: An idle game about Buying Slaves. Hurry up, collect money and buy slaves, they will protect you from being burned and cursed by Anubis!

name: Sylvio and the Mountains Giants
description: An unknow evil has come to disturb the fragile balance of the land of Yahouna. Only a clever and pure being can save them all...

name: Smithy Shop
description: Combine materials and create countless swords combinations for your clients at the ever burning forge in Smithy Shop. Manage your materials and choose your swords bearers wisely, as every sword counts towards a cause, and you'll soon discover their repercussions, good and bad.

name: Rolando: Deluxe Edition
description: Roll, bounce and blast your squad of Rolandos across the Rolando Kingdom in this charming and delightful puzzle platformer

name: HappySnowMan
description: The purpose of this game is to travel through various platforms to the last island. Run to the stable on the last island. Depending on which platform you step on, the speed of movement and jumping power will vary. Don't forget to save your progress by pressing the 'E' key on the island's landmark.

name: Choppie's
description: A horror game where you have to escape a restaurant from a killer rabbit that has got a really sharp arm. Will you chicken out or face your fears?

name: Soul Passage
description: The fate of the unbound souls is in your hands. Take control of Obligor with lots of different skill and weapon combinations, and fight, and explore different planets in Soul Universe. A fantastic 2D hand-drawn Metroidvania with a unique quest and story system.

name: Train Simulator Classic: E60 Electric Locomotive
description: The massive and powerful General Electric E60 electric, born during the formative years of Amtrak and employed also by NJ Transit, now comes to Train Simulator Classic through the superb creativity of developer Reppo!

name: Keeping It Shrimple
description: "Keeping It Shrimple" is a management game where you breed, feed, and care for your adorable shrimp. Experiment with breeding pairs. Manage the water properties of your tanks. Sell rare breeds on the market. With planning, experimentation, and a dose of luck, you may just breed the perfect shrimp!

name: Lhama Clicker
description: Lhama Clicker is a clicker game about reproduce an infinitly amount of lhamas, to increase your production to ridiculous numbers

name: Destiny Duel
description: Simple to learn, impossible to master. Destiny Duel is a battle of the mind: in order to win, you must predict your opponent's every move. Attack, Guard, Recover, or Dodge. The choice is yours, and every choice matters.

name: Thronefall
description: A minimalist game about building and defending a little kingdom. Thronefall is a classic strategy game without unnecessary complexity, just some healthy hack-and-slay. Build up your base during the day, and defend it ‘til your last breath at night.

name: Nature
description: Nature is a relaxing game for modern people tired of everyday life.

name: Foreign Body
description: Get in, get out. Borough 563 of the Keld district has a Departed problem. Freaks, augmented beyond human recognition. This place… something’s wrong here.

name: Hell Grinder
description: An intense 2D action rogue-lite game. Fight your way level by level through masses of demons and defeat bosses to delve deeper into hell. Collect demon souls to unlock permanent skills and weapons and become even more powerful.

name: eSports Jigsaw Puzzles
description: eSports Jigsaw Puzzles is a free competitive online crossplaying physics jigsaw puzzle simulator where you buy puzzles from the library, solve them, earn coins and break the records! Become the best in the world!

name: Potion Brew
description: You need this game to forget about your life cares and become the best alchemist of this fantasy world with your friends! An alchemy shop keeper game offers you to brew potions for your customers, loot the ingredients in the forest, trade with sellers and compete with rivals.

name: Traveler: The AI Story
description: Welcome to Traveler, a unique and immersive gaming experience unlike any other. In this game, you'll embark on a journey through a series of diverse and fantastical worlds, all crafted by advanced artificial intelligence.

name: Eternal Dreamers Rising
description: Eternal Dreamers Rising continues the popular battle-focused RPG series! New characters, items and challenges await! However you choose to fight, that's up to you!

name: The Wings of Dawn
description: The Wings of Dawn is an open world survival game either survive as a dragon or thrive as a human. The wildlife having evolved entirely differently to anywhere on earth will pose a challenge to everyone. Do what it takes to survive the day and make sure to be in shelter at night.

name: Coastline Survival
description: Coastline Survival is an open world survival game set in lush, beautiful environments. Embark on a journey of fishing, hunting, gathering resources to build your dream home, and crafting gear to master techniques and locations of survival legends!

name: Mummy Rumble VR
description: Mummy Rumble VR lets you choose what you want to play in a sandbox style. Collecting mummy heads in creative ways to gain new weaponry filled with different perks. Trick your enemies by trapping them in the pit of doom but make sure not to trap yourself !

name: Aposfera Spacetrips
description: Space trips across the your personal universe

name: Emil: A Hero's Journey
description: As Nazi forces take his father, equipped only with his imagination and creativity, Emil goes on a journey to find him. Emil: A Hero's Journey is a Cinematic Puzzle-Platformer, combining intense action and creative puzzle solving. inspired by actual testimonies that took place during WW2.

name: Bar Simulator
description: Create a real oasis in the Arizona desert and be forever marked with golden letters in the history of fried chicken! Develop your own recipes that will make your coatings stand out from the competition, as well as provide efficient guest service, by which you will ensure their constant flow!

name: Out of Nowhere
description: Be in control of a dog in an adventure action horror game set in a full of mysteries fantasy medieval open world where aliens took over and there is no one left to help you. Explore the different areas to find out how to defeat them.

name: Burg Wimmel
description: In Burg Wimmel the player has to find black and white hand-painted objects in the setting of a medieval castle and bring them to colorful life.

name: Ultimate Chicken Path
description: Waking up in a cold office, where do you look first? You're a random kid who went missing in entertainment complex. Let's play hide and seek with scary robots. Try to escape and tell everyone the truth about this place.

name: Hyperdope
description: An urban survival roguelite. Search the trash. Build capitol. Steal a Cops gun. Piss yourself. Drink a soda. Kill your boss. Buy a mattress. Shoot some hoops. Transcend flesh.

name: Lost Hotel
description: "Lost's Hotel" is a 3D horror adventure puzzle game which make you explore and find the way out from this mysterious hotel.You have to find the 4 codes that are hidden in different rooms to unlock the way down to the next floor. The last exit is on the lowest floor.

name: Plastic
description: You're a plastic soldier fighting to defend the backyard. An online third person shooter where the focus is on item sets and team coordinated assaults in an open world objective driven game mode.

name: Tanks Battle
description: Defeat the enemy tank with the help of logic and tactics.

name: Call of the Abyss
description: Call of the Abyss is a rogue-like card game inspired by anime such as Made in Abyss. You have a long way to go, descending into the abyss. Explore the depths of this world, defeat mysterious enemies and find unexplainable things.

name: Mini Knight's Journey
description: Mini Knight's Journey is a linear action-adventure platformer game about two twin brothers who, with their father, go on a journey to defeat the school bullies! Play as one of the two brothers and face this incredible adventure!

name: Chillquarium
description: Chillquarium is a relaxing idle game. Buy fish and raise them in real time, then sell them to turn a profit! Customize your aquarium and fill your collection with rare exotic fish, and unlock ultra-rare color variants!

name: Moriarty Chronicles
description: Put yourself in the shoes of Moriarty and plan the robbery of "La Gioconda". You have 3 days and 3 nights to organize everything and get away with it. Remember: Do not arouse suspicion, be cautious, talk to other citizens and avoid being seen at the most crucial moments. Do you think you can do it?

name: Spanking Simulator
description: A highly realistic spanking simulation game. Players can experience thrilling spanking punishment plots, or they can use a variety of tools and postures to simulate the spanking punishment in the free mode.

name: Twistales
description: On the day of what she believed to be her ‘Happy ending’, Cinderella witnesses the collapse of her universe and the murder of her beloved. With the help of a magic grimoire, in search of the truth, she walks into various fairy tales, through worlds that are now disturbing and enigmatic. Fighting enemies corrupted by a strange curse, the princess becomes a mighty warrior, determined to resolve this chaos.

name: Eyes of the Ghoul Cat
description: Eyes of the Ghoul Cat is is an action oriented 2D rogue-lite platformer. In this game you explore the lair of Ghoul Cat, where each level is randomly-created and the goal is to hunt down 8 tough bosses. Make your own decisions and complete your unique journey.

name: Coin Trader Simulator
description: Coin Trader Simulator is a cryptocurrency trade simulation. Buy low, sell high coins, get experience to level up your skills, sense trends and pump & dump coins. HODL to the moon!

name: Death Trick: Double Blind
description: The star magician of Morgan’s Traveling Circus has vanished, but the show must go on! Death Trick: Double Blind is a non-linear detective game where an unlikely duo must gather clues, question suspects, and reveal contradictions to unravel the mystery of the missing magician!

name: Subject F-011
description: Trapped in Area 51 on planet Earth, you must solve calculated puzzles to escape this strange planet. Puzzles consist of using enemies' mechanics to your advantage, moving objects to block enemies, and using items that alter parts of the rooms. A spiritual successor to Adventures of Lolo.

name: Kiro II: The Wizards Guild
description: Kiro II: The Wizards Guild is a fantasy based multiplayer dungeon crawler in which up to six players can join online together to navigate through semi-procedurally generated dungeons using a classic text command system to slay monsters, collect loot, and defeat dungeon bosses.

name: HuaBing
description: Pictorial Pie is a large multi-person online role-playing game in the Xianxia sandbox. With the growth of martial arts, the construction of the Zongmen and the Cave, and the free PVP battle, dangers and opportunities can be seen everywhere.

name: Lords of Infinity
description: Lead an ancient and crumbling noble house in a rich gunpowder fantasy setting. Lie, bribe, and conspire to secure power and prestige – or to save a doomed kingdom from itself.

name: Nightway
description: Nightway is a multiplayer horror game designed for 1-6 players. In this game, one player is randomly selected to be the monster, a creature who is blind but can hear perfectly. The other players take on the role of survivors who must work together to avoid the monster and escape the forest by train.

name: Boom 42
description: Experience the nostalgia of the past, reimagined for the present, Boom 42 is a party game for up to 8 players. Join the Crew-42 on a unique adventure, testing friendship and discovering new exciting planets!

name: Frosty's Cold Hard Produce!
description: Twas the Night before Christmas and all through the streets not a creature was stirring but there were some dope beats, From across the town square, covered in a neon glow the gentleman's club was open and it was time to go.

name: Mountain Parkour
description: Mountain Parkour is a computer game in the genre of parkour, about a desperate man who went to conquer mountain peaks to test himself and collect various crystals that once upon a time were scattered by someone and left by someone.

name: Dragon's Treasure
description: Dragon's Treasure is a Roguelike action game, thousands of characters in a variety of weapons to choose from, free collocation with lighter, combination relic system affect , independent equipment upgrades and synthesis, the dice game events system randomly generated as a result,

name: Mobspawn
description: Absorb your surroundings and repurpose them as projectiles. Ascend the floors of Mobspawn Co in this top-down roguelike shooter.

name: Last Eclipse
description: Guardians and Gods fight for earth's balance.

name: Digital Pierrot Museum
description: Digital Pierrot Museum is a free virtual museum presenting the experience of navigating through a museum of digital and multimedia art through VR and Windows platforms.

name: Conspiracy: Tower Defense
description: Tower Defense game where you build units to destroy incoming waves of monsters.

name: Scholar's Mate
description: Scholar's Mate is an immersive first-person horror experience that puts you in the shoes of Judith, a young woman who wakes up in the gloomy facilities of a psychiatric hospital.

name: Saint Ceri
description: An adult otome with three love interests and monogamous and poly routes! Play as Saintess Ceridwen, an overworked saintess pressured to get engaged in two weeks' time. Can you find love with one -or more- of your suitors? Will you marry for love or duty, or find a way to avoid marriage entirely?

name: Path of Survivors
description: Path of Survivors is a multi-class auto-battler survival game with roguelite elements. Plan your path in the 1000+ nodes passive tree and craft gear to help your battlers survive in this world. You can have up to six units on your team auto-battling their way through hundreds of mobs on the screen.

name: Mega Snaileeyo Adventure
description: Snaileeyo is an open-world, 2.5D and 3D action adventure game.

name: Her Feet
description: The male protagonist is a white-collar, he has a little secret hobby, like massaging girls' feet. But it's not an easy thing to get strange girls to accept it. The player needs to help him meet the girl and gain her trust, get her to agree and enjoy the guy massaging her feet.

name: Photo King
description: A series of bright wii game style levels, you must get the best shot possible, sometimes you will be required to tickle your models with a feather to bring out the biggest smile for your shot.

name: Paleophage
description: Paleophage is a third-person dinosaur survival horror game set in an urban resort. Fight or attempt to outrun over ten varieties of prehistoric creature, solve puzzles and uncover the secrets of the Paleophage, a prehistoric biological nightmare capable of reconstituting ancient life.

name: Emblem of Valor
description: Emblem of Valor is a rougelike deck-building game combined with RPG elements. Form your party, level up your characters, collect powerful cards and equipments to overcome all threats in the Shattered Realm and prove your valor!

name: Yuma
description: Yuma is the story of a girl. How will her fate turn out? Will she cope with all the trials of fate or will she stop halfway? You have to help Yuma save the people, friends and even your own soul. Hide from enemies, learn their fears, create traps - and all this in an atmospheric 2D world.

name: Dawn of Hell
description: Explore the cursed village and discover the sinister secrets it hides. Survive a terrible night and solve challenging puzzles as you try to escape the curse that plagues the place. Experience tension and fear at every step in this horror game.

name: Wild Seas
description: Defend the jewel of evil pirates! Wild Seas is a tower defense game with rogue-like elements, where your positioning can ensure victory

name: Kaila
description: Kaila is a visceral adventure set in an unrelentless, vicious world. Take part of an unforgiving story, leading a gang of four unique outcasts on their quest for survival, or die trying.

name: Sam's Last Nightmare
description: Where does the dream end and reality begins? That's up to you to find out.

name: Get Off My Lawn
description: As the lawn-loving Blue Mollet, it is up to you to keep other Mollets off your grass, by running them over with your lawnmower!

name: Demolition City
description: Each level has limited dynamite and requirements for dropping rubble below the goal line. Earn money and beat all 20 levels!

name: IncrediBots 2
description: IncrediBots is back, and better than ever! Create your own custom robots, replays, and mini-games!

name: Totem Destroyer 2
description:
A new adventure has started. The totems are back, and they came in a big figure this time, over 100.
Your objective is to destroy the totems so you can get their idols from the top, you can't let the idols fall into the ground, they must land on a dark block.

name: Meeblings 2
description:
Each Meebling Does causes the orange meeblings to react in a different way.
Some Dig holes in the ground, others pull, some reverse gravity.
Click the Meeblings at certian times and figure out how to send them home.

name: Achilles
description:
Hack and slash your way through 15 stages of greek warriors.

Violent game containing decapitations, impalements, knee breaks, leg chops etc.

name: Magic Pen
description: Use the mouse to draw an object. You cannot draw inside other objects. Draw a circle by holding the left mouse button. You can use pins and hinges to link two objects together.

name: Magic Pen 2
description: Make clever use of physics to collect all flags in each level. The shapes that you draw are affected by gravity, friction and inertia. Use these properties in your advantage.

name: Straw Hat Samurai
description: A mouse controlled flash game where you draw slashes to attack enemies in different arenas style levels as you travel across the land to end a war.

name: Castle Wars 2
description: Sequel to the popular flash card game CastleWars.

name: Bullettime Fighting
description: You can Fight in Bullettime, run up walls and fight against up to 5 enemies at the same time.

name: Hide the Fart
description: Cut the cheese - discreetly...

name: Ancient Society
description:
Ancient Society is a multi-platform P2E game where your opportunity to create, build, and rule your very own empire through the Ages of Civilization (and beyond) awaits.

Ancient Society mimics the politics and uncertainty of the Classical Era, where alliances are made and broken every day. Will you rise to the top as a diplomatic and cunning ambassador? Or will you smash the forces of your opponents with brute strength and steal resources only to strengthen your own democracy? The choice is yours.

Ancient Society is developed as an NFT-based Play-to-Earn game that incorporates all the thrills and values of NFTs and cryptocurrency coupled with the excitement of real-world building, resource-gathering, and role-playing. Ancient Society is a browser-based game with cross-compatibility with mobile devices and our metaverse-based NFT Worlds.

name: James: The Circus Zebra
description: Fly through the air across tightropes, trampolines and trapezes as James the Zebra takes to the big top! Two minigames can be unlocked after completing the main game once and stay unlocked. Compete for the best online hi-scores!

name: Damn Birds
description: An addictive and elaborate game where your gaming and strategic skills are put to the test as you aim to take down the birds and wisely invest your earned cash into weapons and defenses. The game is also equipped with high scores, play now and compete for the best score!

name: Micro Life
description:
Our AI based game teaching kids about the harsh realities of life. Dont eat? You die. Can’t defend yourself? You die. Get sick and don’t get quarantined? You die and so does everyone else.

Despite all these high jinks – it won Best Game at the Flash Film Festival in New York.

name: Sugar Sugar Rune: Koimo Osharemo Pick Up!
description:
Based on the anime adaption of the manga by Moyoco Anno.

Aim to become a popular witch! Raise your charm and 'pick up' the boys' hearts! Make-up, exercise, making sweets and studying at the Dollhouse will all raise your charm. Use the hearts you capture to purchase clothes from the "Makai Mail Order Book", including outfits from the anime. Includes new original illustrations and full voice over by the anime cast.

name: The Hidden Object Guru
description: The Hidden Object Guru - Find the Hidden Plushies in some of Your favorite Steam games from Archor Games and HO Guru Games !

name: Dynamite Blast
description: Use explosives to reach the level goal.

name: Wake the Royalty
description: If you have already come across physics games of the Wake Up The Box series, you will recognize the style. The goal is to use smart machinery and stir the snoring crowned shapes. Attach wood to wood to activate the mechanisms of gears and ropes and thus solve 20+ physics-based puzzles online for free. The riddles are progressively challenging. That's why it won’t be easy to pass all levels on the first try even if you often play logic games free online. Due to its touch-friendly interface, the puzzle is equally enjoyable on large screens and mobile devices.

name: Out of the Park Baseball 24
description: The 24th release of Out of the Park Developments' award-winning sports strategy franchise. Officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc., and KBO.

name: Sugar Sugar Rune: Queen Shiken wa Dai Panic
description: Sin descripción

name: Totem Destroyer
description: Your mission is to destroy the totems without letting the golden Idol (aka Tot) fall into the ground. Use balance to keep Tot up.

name: Doctor Who Trumps
description: Classic "Top Trumps" style game. You and your opponent have 10 cards and you must select one of four categories (Strength, Style, Intelligence, Fear Factor) and whoever has the higher number takes the other's card. Whoever has all the cards wins.

name: Castle Cannon
description: Try to take the other castle down with your big blaster cannon! Aim and shoot at the other caste and buy some upgrades to defend your own castle!

name: Balloon in a Wasteland
description: When your balloon crash-lands in a wasteland of fowl creatures, its time to survive. Upgrade your weapons, fort, and turrets while you try to fix your balloon. Balance your free time between battles so you are prepared for future waves. Try to escape as soon as you can!

name: Sex Simulator: The Yacht
description: An interactive sex simulation game, featuring realistic high definition graphics and characters. You play the role a guy having fun on a luxurious yacht anchored near warm tropical islands.

name: The Red Abyss: Deep Below
description: The Red Abyss deep below is a game about a detective in the underwater city of Atlan. A few days ago the mayor's wife disappeared. Will you find her, or will the abyss madness get you first?

name: Home Run Boy
description: Home Run Boy is a baseball reflex game. Prove your skills by hitting incoming balls quickly.

name: Super 56
description: Super 56 challenges players to overcome 56 genre-bending mini-games with the press of a single button. Compete in daily challenges, earn achievements, and destroy high scores. Outlandish chaos awaits you in Hell!

name: Orb
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternal Quest
description: Eternal Quest is a video game that mixes genres of strategy and role. Build your deck, choose a hero and open up your path through the portal to restore the citadelle, and become more powerful.

name: Buy My Snake Oil
description: A cosy potion-crafting resource management simulator. Haggle and persuade your way to notoriety as a snake oil salesman, making as much money as you can selling dodgy pharmaceuticals to maintain a positive reputation with the townspeople.

name: Freedom's Twilight
description: Summoned to the strange dark fantasy world of Amissus you will encounter both natural and supernatural obstacles as you explore, collect, craft, learn, build, and survive the fog blanketed realm. Fight back the abhorrent creatures of darkness and build yourself a place you can call home.

name: Tetris
description:
A remaster of Nintendo's Tetris released in the Tetris & Dr. Mario bundle.
The game was later released standalone once on the Nintendo Gateway System.

name: Diced Pilot
description: Diced Pilot is a 2D action game containing old-school platform-based movement/jump timing challenges, physics-based surroundings, jetpacks, and weapons that can destroy everything in sight!

name: Ninety-Six
description: A remade version of 96, with optimized performance, reworked maps and brand-new features. This version also contains the bonus episode Another Story and a secret folder to unlock at the end of the game.

name: Deck 'Em!
description: Look, kid. Deck Em! is a solitaire-style boxing game. A card game you play to play. But you’re not even a contender. You’re a nobody. A total long shot. The Champ is a stone-cold killer. As big as an ox. Stronger than oak. But you got a lot of heart, kid. And, Mickey loves you.

name: Tearing Spaces
description: Tearing Spaces is a competitive NFT game where players battle it out to earn tokens and rewards. Players battle in teams of 3v3 against real players from around the world.

name: Slam Dunk: Dream Team - Shueisha Limited
description: Sin descripción

name: The Master of Puzzles
description: You are the bad guy. And you targeted the wrong house.

name: Apex Legends: Revelry
description:
To celebrate another anniversary of the Apex Games, Duardo Silva's throwing quite the party. But Mad Maggie never met a Syndicate event she didn't want to crash.
R.S.V.P. to the wildest party in Outlands history. It’s time to drop in and get legendary in Apex Legends: Revelry! New Team Deathmatch mode joins the Apex Games, and remastered Legend classes means everyone has a role to play. And with the new Nemesis rifle joining the Loadout, the big guns have officially arrived. The party don't start till you drop in!

name: Apex Legends Mobile: Champions
description:
While the memory of a battle fades, the strength of a Legend only grows. Tell a lasting tale when you enter the ring in Apex Legends Mobile: Champions.
Greetings Legends and welcome to Season 3 of Apex Legends Mobile! Strap in and prepare yourselves for battle with Apex Mobile’s largest update to date. In this update, we have a new Legend joining the Apex Games, new events, changes to core systems, balancing for Legends and weapons alike and much more. Players who update to the latest patch early will receive seasonal currency and extra syndicate packs!

name: Samba de Amigo: Party Central
description: Get up and shake it with Amigo and friends! It's time for an all- new Samba de Amigo: a music rhythm game that allows you to party around the world!

name: Fashion Dreamer
description: Enter a virtual world of fashion fantasies made real, where coordination and communication mix like never before. Your new life as an influencer awaits!

name: Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective
description: "Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective" was created by Shu Takumi, the creator of the Ace Attorney series, and is now back in a long-requested HD remaster of the original 2010 release!

name: DecaPolice
description:
DecaPolice, a crime-suspense RPG from Level-5, developers of the Layton series, will be released on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Steam in 2026!

The main character, a rookie detective named Harvard, hunts down criminals in a huge open-world crime-ridden city, traveling back and forth between physical and virtual reality.

name: Harmony: The Fall of Reverie
description: The fate of humanity is at stake. Use your gift of clairvoyance to see into the future and stop an apocalypse that threatens the balance between your world and the deities'.

name: Metroid Prime Remastered
description:
Get behind the visor of intergalactic bounty hunter Samus Aran in her critically-acclaimed first-person adventure.

Step into the boots of Samus Aran as you navigate the winding paths and interconnected environments of an alluring-yet-dangerous alien planet. Use powers like the iconic Morph Ball and Grapple Beam to revisit hard-to-reach areas and find a path forward. With revamped graphics, sound, unlockable art, and updated control schemes, Samus’ 3D platforming debut has reached greater heights. Calm and capable, Samus takes on this solo mission...but she is far from alone.

name: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time
description: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time is an RPG life-sim game and the long-awaited sequel to the 3DS classic Fantasy Life. This game will expand on what the original did, blending simulation with traditional action RPG combat mechanics.

name: Professor Layton and the New World of Steam
description:
Professor Layton and the New World of Steam depicts the world one year after the events of "Professor Layton and the Unwound Future".

Due to a mysterious incident in Steam Bison, a new adventure for Layton and Luke begins!
