name: Xenoblade Chronicles 3: DLC Wave 1
description:
This wave of DLC contains the following content:

- Consumable items: Silver Nopon Coins x 30 and Gold Nopon Coins x 10
- Accessories: Iron Temple Guard, Circlet of Wisdom, Silver Belt, Glass Memory, Nopon Strap, and Auto-Balancer
- Color variations for existing outfits

name: Xenoblade Chronicles 3: DLC Wave 2
description:
Challenge Battle mode against difficult enemies:
- Overcome a variety of challenges by playing the Challenge Battle mode. Collect crystals and exchange them for valuable accessories and new outfits.

A new hero character and accompanying quests:
- This wave adds the new hero character, Ino, to the game. Complete her Hero Quest to recruit her to your party and gain access to her class.

New character outfits:
- Swimsuits

name: Xenoblade Chronicles 3: DLC Wave 3
description:
Challenge Battle mode against difficult enemies:
- Archsage's Gauntlet

A new hero character and accompanying quests:
- Masha
- New character outfits

name: Xenoblade Chronicles 3: Future Redeemed
description: A new original story scenario for Xenoblade Chronicles 3.

name: Xenoblade Chronicles 3: Expansion Pass
description: The Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Expansion Pass includes access to multiple waves of DLC content as they become available. The pass contains a total of 4 waves.

name: Pro Mahjong Tsuwamono: Renka-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Pride of the Valley
description: Take a step through the castle’s next doorway and get ready to take in the beauty of the Lion King realm! Not only will you get to immerse yourself in a brand new, mysterious storyline as you explore this realm, but it will also mark Simba and Nala’s introduction to Dreamlight Valley. And was that a new... recipe we spied? Only time will tell! With two more new faces to look forward to welcoming to your village, here's hoping Scar behaves himself...

name: Super Formation Soccer 95: della Serie A - UCC Xaqua
description: The UCC Xaqua version is a kind of promotional edition, the idea was to promote a sports drink (energy drink) called Xaqua (manufactured by UCC and endorsed by the Italian Football League) with the participation or partnership of the Italian footballer Roberto Baggio (clearly visible on the back of the game packaging), via a contest held in 1995 in which the participants had to correctly answer three questions and return the postcard. The winners received the cartridge as a prize. Only 3000 copies were distributed. In the opening scene instead of having the cinematic intro sequence showing all the team logos, there is an advertisement of Xaqua featuring Roberto Baggio (1993 FIFA World Player of the Year). Also the box art is different, and in the UCC Xaqua version there is a strong hidden team called Xaqua.

name: WBSC eBaseball: Power Pros
description: Experience the virtual world of baseball available in WBSC eBASEBALL: POWER PROS. The most played baseball game series in Japan is now featured in the World Baseball Softball Confederation’s eSport discipline. Whether you like swinging for the fences or pitching in the strike zone, you know baseball is all about batting, pitching, and fielding. The virtual world of baseball is no different. With easy pick-up-and-play mechanics, WBSC eBASEBALL: POWER PROS is fun for both novices and skilled gamers

name: Super Formation Soccer 95: della Serie A - Extra Package
description: Sin descripción

name: Splatoon 3: Inkopolis
description:
Wave 1 was released on 28 February 2023 and added Inkopolis Plaza from Splatoon as an alternate hub world accessible via the subway station found in Splatsville. From here, players have access to services as they originally appeared in Splatoon, including Ammo Knights, Cooler Heads, Jelly Fresh, Shrimp Kicks, and Spyke, although they share the same lineup as their Splatsville counterparts. Certain shops are run by new characters. Additionally, the Squid Sisters perform City of Color (2023) in concerts during the first half of Splatfests and sing Tomorrow's Nostalgia Today during the second half, both while wearing their original outfits from Splatoon.

Additionally, the Great Zapfish can be seen atop Inkopolis Tower and the amiibo box retains its functionality. Other features from Splatoon 3 have also been added, such as a Grizzco Industries building and a Tableturf Battle Dojo hidden behind several buildings. The grate leading to Octo Valley is blocked off by a tire and a stack of boxes, while the arcade machine is covered up and replaced with a terminal to remotely access Hotlantis.

name: Etrian Odyssey HD
description:
Etrian Odyssey HD remasters the timeless adventure of the labyrinth that swallows all.

Build a party of explorers from nine different character classes - Create a woodland survivalist, shield-bearing protector, whip-wielding dark hunter, and more. Scour through the dungeon's many layers and fend off the unknown to discover the truth behind the Yggdrasil Labyrinth.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, difficulty options and save slots

name: Super Tetris 2 + BomBliss: Gentei-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Splatoon 3: Side Order
description:
Challenge yourself to a new single-player campaign, Side Order! As Agent 8, you wake up to discover Inkopolis Square has been drained of color and its residents have gone missing.

Looming over the city is the ominous Spire of Order. Alongside a drone who claims to be Off the Hook member Pearl, Agent 8 must fight off waves of enemies in floor after floor of challenges on their way to the top of the Spire and learn its secrets.

Use color chips to boost your abilities in this experience that’s designed to be replayed over and over.

name: Splatoon 3: Expansion Pass
description: Contains downloads for Inkopolis and Side Order, which will be made available as they release.

name: Reese’s Puffs x Ambush Breakfastverse
description: Explore the future of breakfast in an immersive Reese’s Puffs and Ambush created universe. Collect Chrome Puffs as you travel through a space kitchen, milk world, and Chrome Throne inside the sacred mouth.

name: Etrian Odyssey: Origins Collection
description:
Create endless adventures with the Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection!

Explore the rich beginnings of this RPG franchise with remasters of three timeless adventures that inspire players to go on a journey of discovery, mapping deep dungeons, and building customized parties for exploring and engaging in tactical combat. Play as the leader of a guild of adventurers, searching for rare treasures and secrets within the depths of a vast, sprawling labyrinth. Traverse and draw a map of the environment while encountering enemies large and small in turn-based combat, then return to town to rest, sell materials for better equipment, and manage your party, selecting from a collection of heroes to build the right team for the job.

Survive a vast, labyrinthian forest on the edge of a peaceful village in Etrian Odyssey HD, journey to a floating castle in the sky in Etrian Odyssey II HD, and be transported to an oceanic paradise and rumors of a drowned city in Etrian Odyssey III HD.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Etrian Odyssey II HD
description:
Etrian Odyssey II HD rebirths the timeless adventure of the mysterious floating castle.

Build your own party from twelve different classes of heroes and climb through the Yggdrasil tree to reach the clouds and uncover the truth of High Lagaard.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Etrian Odyssey III HD
description:
Etrian Odyssey III HD brings the timeless adventure set in Armoroad, a sea city facing the aftermath of a great calamity.

Build your own party of explorers from the all-new twelve different character classes. Descend the labyrinth that swallowed the mystery of Armoroad and the drowned city.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: SevTech: Ages
description: SevTech: Ages is a massive modpack packed with content and progression. This pack focuses on providing the player a long term progression experience with purpose. SevTech introduces a number of mechanics never before done such as: hiding ore until unlocked, dynamically hidden items and recipes based on progress, new mobs appear as you progress further, and much more! The modpack uses the vanilla advancement system to guide the player along while still allowing an open, sandbox experience. As you progress through the hundreds of custom advancements you will unlock new "ages" which will show you new mods to work through.

name: Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition version announced for Japan with a limited quantity of 10,000 copies available for purchase according to the site.
This physical edition Includes a download code for the Persona Characters DLC and a Nintendo Switch stylus.

Create endless adventures with the Etrian Odyssey Origins Collection!

Explore the rich beginnings of this RPG franchise with remasters of three timeless adventures that inspire players to go on a journey of discovery, mapping deep dungeons, and building customized parties for exploring and engaging in tactical combat. Play as the leader of a guild of adventurers, searching for rare treasures and secrets within the depths of a vast, sprawling labyrinth. Traverse and draw a map of the environment while encountering enemies large and small in turn-based combat, then return to town to rest, sell materials for better equipment, and manage your party, selecting from a collection of heroes to build the right team for the job.

Survive a vast, labyrinthian forest on the edge of a peaceful village in Etrian Odyssey HD, journey to a floating castle in the sky in Etrian Odyssey II HD, and be transported to an oceanic paradise and rumors of a drowned city in Etrian Odyssey III HD.

New features included remastered graphics, a remastered soundtrack, quality of life improvements, difficulty options and save slots

name: Jungle Quest
description:
During a walk in the park, you found a portal that leads to the mysterious world. An amazing sanctuary populated by animals appears in front of you. But how do you get back?

To find the way home, you have to solve a series of puzzles and explore the mysterious world of flying islands.

name: Signal Lost
description:
The connection with the secret research station “Asgard”, orbiting the Earth, was unexpectedly lost five hours ago. Later on the station moved to a fading orbit. It is just one hour left until “Asgard” will enter the atmosphere of our planet. If the station falls on Earth, it will lead to millions of victims. You are a part of emergency team that has to restore the operability of the station systems, required to correct the orbit. To make this possible, your consciousness will be digitally integrated into the experimental model of engineer robots, which luckily are now being tested on another orbital station close by.

What is hidden inside the space station that now appears lifeless and where did its crew disappear? Find answers and repair the main on-board computer to prevent a disaster.

name: Sanctum
description:
The world of H.P. Lovecraft is full of dark places and mystical creatures that you should stay away from. You received a letter from your close friend Anna, a detective conducting an investigation of mysterious disappearances in the nearby forests. Now you have no other choice but to do everything to save her. In the letter she asked for your help and then you never heard back from her again...

You are about to conduct your own investigation. It is time to visit an old abandoned monastery, where the cult of an ancient deity settled. You will have to risk not only your life but also your soul when you encounter the mysterious force that slumbers in the dungeon of the empty monastery. In order to find out what happened to your friend and get away from paranormal phenomena you will have to face horrifying secrets this dark sanctuary hides and solve ancient puzzles.

name: Cyberpunk
description:
It’s the beginning of the 22nd century.

Society has collapsed amid rapid technological progress. People are modifying their own bodies extensively. Corporations war with one another over data, which has become the most valuable commodity on the market.

Your group, made up of cyborgs equipped with special skills, has decided to steal some rare data from the archives of an influential corporation. Infiltrating the complex unnoticed, you must get to the archives and download the stack memory. But there won’t be anything easy about that.

name: The Prison
description: Your police force team has been cracking down on criminal gangs for years and taking no prisoners. The last major operation left several corrupt police heads rolling. Therefore, glory is just one step from oblivion. You’ve been framed and put in jail on trumped-up charges. Your friends still have their freedom though. The escape plan is all set, and now you’ll need all the courage, all the cunning and all the luck you have to get to freedom and clear your name. And to carry on your fight for justice.

name: Mission Sigma
description:
Secret services have located and neutralized a known terrorist who has been hiding out in a deprived area of the city for the last ten years. This is where the good news ends. It turns out that on the roof of an abandoned high-rise the maniac has installed a nuclear warhead with a timer on it.

The building itself has been turned into a tower filled with intricate traps and obstacles. You have been recommended as a specialist in such puzzles, and the secret service has helped you infiltrate the courtyard. The rest is down to you.

Can you get past all the traps and preempt a nuclear attack?

name: Paranormasight: The Seven Mysteries of Honjo
description:
How far would you go to bring someone back from the dead? Discover the depths that some will go to in this horror-adventure game.

Set in Honjo, Tokyo's Sumida ward during the Showa period (1926-89), this is the unsettling tale of those with the power to curse, derived from the gruesome real world urban legends: "The Seven Mysteries of Honjo."

Follow the cursed seven as they embark on a supernatural ordeal over a three-day period to realise their desperate hopes and dreams.

name: Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu ha Kibou de Mawatteru!
description: Momotaro Dentetsu is a board game series that began in 1988 and will celebrate its 35th anniversary this year. Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu ha Kibou de Mawatteru! is a new take on the Momotaro Dentesu experience.

name: Sky Haven: AR Merge Adventure
description: Uncover a worldwide mystery as a member of H.A.V.E.N., the agency whose mission is to research and protect the newly-discovered creatures living in our skies. Equip yourself with the agency’s latest gadgets and team up with local Guardians in your city to explore these majestic beings. With the help of your AR-enabled device and agency-issued drone, your mission is to heal, nourish, research, and communicate with an entirely new species. But be careful who you trust, because not everyone has the same altruistic agenda. Even other members of the agency could be plotting in secret.

name: Natsu-Mon: 20th Century Summer Kid
description: Natsu-Mon! 20-seiki no Natsu-yasumi is an adventure game where you spend a summer as a boy. Catch insects, fish, swim in the sea, and interact with the towns people. You can also travel to neighboring towns by train and participate in festivals at night. By experiencing various things, the things you can do and the places you can go will expand.

name: Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg
description:
It’s not about saving the world. In this "leisure adventure RPG," failing student Marie pursues alchemy, adventures, and quests while aiming to graduate in five years. "Atelier Marie," the origin of the Atelier series, has been remade with new elements!

The remake changes include:
Character designs and event illustrations have been revamped, 2D animations have added and there are now 3D models of characters and stages.

The tutorial and navigation of the game’s features have been expanded and improved. The methods of moving around the city and collecting items in the field has been modified to meet modern-day demands, making it more comfortable and easier to play.

The new Unlimited Mode, which allows you to play at a more relaxed pace by removing the five year deadline, and the addition of new events that enable interactions with new characters.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 1
description: Fire Emblem: Engage Expansion Pass - Wave 1 includes character – Edelgard, Dimitri, Claude and Tiki. Also includes in-game support items, In-game accessories and Silver card.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 2
description: Fire Emblem: Engage Expansion Pass - Wave 2 includes additional Emblem characters, in-game support items and new in-game accessories.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 3
description: Obtain Emblem Bracelets to Engage with more Emblem characters and get support items and new accessories with the Paid DLC for the Fire Emblem Engage game. Purchase and download the Fire Emblem Engage: Expansion Pass today for Wave 1 and meet Edelgard, Dimitri, and Claude (as a one Emblem Bracelet) and take on Divine Paralogues to get Tiki as an Emblem character. As more waves become available, you can test your mettle in even more Divine Paralogues, obtain Emblem characters and accessories, and experience a brand-new story with added characters and locations.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 4
description: Obtain Emblem Bracelets to Engage with more Emblem characters and get support items and new accessories with the Paid DLC for the Fire Emblem Engage game. Purchase and download the Fire Emblem Engage: Expansion Pass today for Wave 1 and meet Edelgard, Dimitri, and Claude (as a one Emblem Bracelet) and take on Divine Paralogues to get Tiki as an Emblem character. As more waves become available, you can test your mettle in even more Divine Paralogues, obtain Emblem characters and accessories, and experience a brand-new story with added characters and locations.

name: Mega Man
description: A remaster of Mega Man released in Mega Man: The Wily Wars.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage Expansion Pass
description: Obtain Emblem Bracelets to Engage with more Emblem characters and get support items and new accessories with the Paid DLC for the Fire Emblem Engage game. Purchase and download the Fire Emblem Engage: Expansion Pass today for Wave 1 and meet Edelgard, Dimitri, and Claude (as a one Emblem Bracelet) and take on Divine Paralogues to get Tiki as an Emblem character. As more waves become available, you can test your mettle in even more Divine Paralogues, obtain Emblem characters and accessories, and experience a brand-new story with added characters and locations.

name: Mega Man 2
description: Remaster of Rockman 2 included in Mega Man: The Wily Wars. It doesn't have the "Normal" mode from the international version (Mega Man 2).

name: Mega Man 3
description: A remaster of Mega Man 3 included in Mega Man: The Wily Wars.

name: Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean
description: Players will have the opportunity to discover or rediscover the emotional journeys of the Baten Kaitos series, which features distinct card-based RPG systems that allow for split-second decisions that edge participants closer to victory. Players will take the role of a Guardian Spirit, guiding each game’s protagonist and their companions through their journey.

name: Baten Kaitos Origins
description: Players will have the opportunity to discover or rediscover the emotional journeys of the Baten Kaitos series, which features distinct card-based RPG systems that allow for split-second decisions that edge participants closer to victory. Players will take the role of a Guardian Spirit, guiding each game’s protagonist and their companions through their journey.

name: Baten Kaitos I & II HD Remaster
description: Two RPG masterpieces return. Originally released for the Nintendo GameCube, Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean and Baten Kaitos Origins are back with improved graphics and new features to aid game progression, making them even more accessible for new players.

name: PokeRoku 2
description:
PokeRoku 2 is a minigame pack which could be downloaded from Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 2.

It contains the minigames:

Tatakae! Rockman: a shooting minigame;

Janken de Battle: a Janken minigame.

name: PokeRoku 3
description:
PokeRoku 3 is a minigame pack which could be downloaded from Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 3.

It contains the minigames:

Go Go Rush!!: an obstacle race minigame featuring Rush;

Janken de Battle: a Janken minigame.

name: PokeRoku 4
description:
PokeRoku 4 is a minigame pack which could be downloaded from Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 4.

It contains the minigames:

Get Eddie: an arcade minigame featuring Eddie;

Janken de Battle: a Janken minigame.

name: PokeRoku 5
description:
PokeRoku 5 is a minigame pack which could be downloaded from Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 5.

It contains:

Break!! Beat: a balloon popping minigame featuring Beat;

Janken de Battle: a Janken minigame.

name: PokeRoku 6
description:
PokeRoku 6 is a minigame pack which could be downloaded from Rockman Complete Works: Rockman 6.

It contains:

Rockman Dash!: a side-scrolling action game featuring Mega Man;

Janken de Battle: a Janken minigame.

name: Tetris New Century
description: Brand new and exclusive to Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 28: Tetris Collection is "Tetris New Century", which builds upon the 1988 System 16 version of Tetris. New Century implements many of the standards set by The Tetris Company, including the standardised colour scheme, wall kicks, being able to "hold" a piece and the "T-Spin" move (allowing you spin a T-tetromino to fill in gaps shortly before the piece locks into place).

name: Unsolved Case: Fatal Clue
description: Use your logic and intuition to uncover chilling secrets in the additional locations! Find helpful clues and solve complicated puzzles in a series of interactive crime stories!

name: Escape From Dimension-3
description: Escape From Dimension-3 is a puzzle platforming adventure and an atmospheric mix between 2D and 3D, that explores an alien mind control experiment story where you are trapped in this alien realm and you have to uncover deep secrets as you try to escape back to reality.

name: For Evelyn II: Shards of Creation
description: For Evelyn II is a captivating adventure RPG in the magical world of Aura. Rich story, handcrafted 2D/3D environments, classic adventuring, choices, and retro pixel art. Explore, level up, and immerse yourself in an unforgettable journey where your decisions shape your destiny.

name: Hoop Fighters
description: Knock your friends down to the ground and destroy their hoops! Hoop Fighters is an online basketball game for up to 6 players, free from rules. Create your character and join the game. Trip up or slap opponents, do whatever it takes to grab the ball. Remember, there are no rules in Hoop Fighters!

name: Dungeon Furry
description: Explore Dungeons, with enemies and puzzles, and horny girls. After the best rewards you can get for saving furry girls.

name: Misremembered Memories
description: A retro styled Len'en fangame inspired by the Japanese PC-98 Touhou Project games. Enjoy a nostalgic shoot-'em-up experience with faithful graphics and music without the hang-ups of outdated hardware.

name: King Fishing
description: King Fishing classic fish species and cool special effects, all kinds of goldfish, featured fish, let you love, bring super experience, retain childhood fishing memories, innovation to join the room theme gameplay, release skills sprint list!

name: Benders of Moona
description: Discover the power of healing through the pursuit of mastery in the art of waterbending. Learn new skills, explore a living world full of riddles and mysteries that plague the peace between the material and spiritual world. A hand-drawn 2d platformer inspired by digital oil painting.

name: Battle Mage
description: Battle Mage is a rogue-like/souls-like/Metroidvania. It features fast responsive sword, bow and spell combat, in an endlessly repeating randomly generated environment. With a narrative that takes the player throughout the massive maze-like world.

name: Kinetic: Break All Limits
description: Fast, fluid, and exhilarating. Jump, dash, bounce, and swing through a world of freedom. There is nothing holding you back. Destroy enemies with your energy blasts as you race to the finish, fight friends online, or free your home planet from an invasive menace in adventure mode!

name: The Children's Friend
description: Sin descripción

name: Eye of D'akess
description: A short, story-centric rpg with turnbased combat, about a journey into the unknown in search of adventure and treasure - pulled ever along, by what awaits them in the dark...

name: Suikoro
description: You are now the dice, so roll you to solve the puzzle. You need to think about where you want your eyes to go, because the goal is opened by matching the designated panel on the ground with the eyes on the dice.

name: Love Birds
description: Get them cats! Play alone or join your friends to kill every last cat, but that's not your only enemy. All those forest freaks are gonna be out to get you. Explore the many different biomes and rescue your imprisoned fellow birds! Build a bird army!

name: Hunker Down
description: How long can you survive a post-apocalyptic world? A land overrun with an infected "zombie" population, where you compete with other survivors for limited resources.

name: Ladybugs and Storm
description: Ladybugs and storm is open world exploration simulation, it is about ladybugs survival through the storm, the mission is explore the towers on tiny islands for some food, so the ladybugs will survive through the storm

name: Vignette: Memories of Baruu
description: The world is ending - yet even the darkest moments hold beauty within them. Set in the whimsical world of Baruu, you take on the role of a young photographer and help peculiar characters accept their fate by fulfilling their final wishes.

name: Entropoly
description: Entropoly is a time-trial platformer inspired by platform fighters. Wavedash into the psychedelic realms of the elements and help Poly fight chaos to restore balance.

name: Lost Day
description: At that the day, the world ended. People die left and right. Scream heard everywhere. Yet, this is the beginning of my new life. A life where I could finally found my happiness.

name: Bryce Tiles
description: A Manhattan/taxicab-geometric tile-based isometric puzzle strategy game featuring everyone's favorite 90's anti-hero, Bryce! You'll push boxes across tiles, sands, still waters, rapids, moving floors, ice and coals to move into position! Don't forget to redirect the lasers and evade those enemies!

name: Goma Ayakaze
description: It's a world similar to ours, but where the darkness of the night is indeed riddled with monsters. Reika Ayakaze, an apprentice "hunter" who strikes down the monsters that threaten the people of the world, one day, she learns that an unfamiliar pattern is appearing on her best friend, Mana Tomita.

name: Crystal Winter
description: Naoki was really excited about spending Christmas with his beloved. But those plans weren't meant to be - Naoki saw her hugging another guy. Christmas seems ruined but just one random encounter can change everything. This is a Japanese-style kinetic visual novel about Christmas.

name: Bremen Hot Strings
description: Bremen Hot Strings is a graphic adventure that adapts the original Brothers Grimm fairy tale "Town Musicians of Bremen" within the context of 1930s Germany under the yoke of Nazism.

name: Bouncing Music
description: This game can create random music by drawing different types of blocks and using the collision of marbles. Through the guidance of mini-levels one by one, you will gradually master how to create music on this music canvas.

name: Longborn
description: A battle royal like game based on fantasy spell casting and weapon wielding.

name: Daimei no nai Game Rigakkkai
description: Sin descripción

name: Sisters of Sodomorrah
description: A visual novel telling the story of the fabled city of Sodomorrah, where one hundred and eleven maidens are kept in isolation. What secrets hide behind in the desert that they call home?

name: Silent Harbor
description: Silent Harbor is a first-person horror adventure game that will immerse you in a creepy story.

name: Pogoppl
description: Physics-based pogo stick platforming!

name: Folia: The King's Revelry
description: Restore Folia to a world shrouded in darkness as you explore the wonders of the Brazilian landscape to find Talia's sister.

name: D&M: Spark of Fate
description: D&M (Dungeon and Monsters): Spark of Fate is a dungeon crawler game that takes place in a dark monster-infested labyrinth. Your goal is to escape from this vile place where you were imprisoned and find your way out using the few resources you find along the way.

name: Star Surfer
description: Star Surfer is an action roguelike where the goal is survival through upgrading powerful weapons and ship modifications.

name: Digs
description: Defend your valuable chest in randomly generated maps with various towers, traps and obstacles to modify the path that the enemies must follow in "Digs", the ultimate rogue-like tower defense game. Experience unique mechanics, upgrade your defenses and face off against challenging enemies

name: Space Game: Star We There Yet?
description: It’s an idle game! It’s a battle game! It’s a Space Game! Welcome to the ultimate interstellar road trip. Travel across the cosmos, collect rare and honorable crew, then use them to battle against friends and foes alike in this unique (and oddly addicting) adventure!

name: Ideal Gas
description: In this Explosive Ballon Based Puzzler, all you have to do is get the balloons safely to the end zone. Simple, right? Use a variety of fans and other tools to avoid obstacles and finish the experiment.

name: Skeletery
description: As a skeleton, build your cemetery and defend it against human raids!

name: Ternion
description: The fate of all civilization rests in the hands of four teenagers trying to stop their former leader from eradicating all life in the universe after he is driven insane as a consequence of infection by his own creation.

name: Dead Trip: Hope
description: Take part in the adventures of Lars and Jessica in a world of death and chaos. Surviving among the crowds of zombies in search of supplies and fuel in order to pursue the last hope of saving humanity and defeating the virus.

name: Sheep Lad
description: Sheep Lad is a grand scale Swashbuckling, Role-playing, Platforming Adventure Game, with a focus on combat, exploration, and surreal mysteries. Take on the Role of Basil the Sheep Lad as he journeys into a dangerous land Dungeoneering and Questing in search for his older sister

name: Wolfteam: Reboot
description: Wolfteam is a game where you can enjoy a variety of team formations and battlefield situations that change from moment to moment, such as humans and wolves, wolves and wolves, through the keyword werewolves, beyond human-to-human battles.

name: Outpath: First Journey
description: Outpath: First Journey is a prologue chapter of the main game, Outpath. An experimental clicker base building game. Craft, gather & manage resources, build your base and buy more islands to exploit and expand!

name: Yummy Girls 2
description: Relax class puzzle game to keep you in a good mood

name: Life Effect
description: Alien invaders invaded the planet, having exterminated most of the population, humanity, being on the verge of annihilation, united the armies and gave a serious rebuff to the enemy. After several years of war, the climate on the planet has changed. The military founded fortifications.

name: Blockappend
description: A 3D puzzle game where you append blocks to each other by flipping them around.

name: Oriental Immortal
description: A 3D multiplayer open-world sandbox with a story based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. Starting as a mortal being, you must fight your way to ascension. Embarking on a path to immortality, gain spiritual and physical enhancements that will shape your journey, and finally, make your own fate.

name: Ranger Quest: The Elemental Orbs
description: Disaster has befallen you, but hope is not lost. Explore the libraries and learn the ancient incantations to unlock the full power of the Elemental Orbs. Completing your epic quest requires a showdown with the evil Grand Mage Marduk in his magical fortress.

name: Sugar Shack
description: Sugar Shack is a maple syrup management game and world crafter set in a cozy, magical forest inspired by Quebec lore and art. Hungry villagers with endless sweet tooths make their way to this legendary shack. Grab some friends, fire up the boiler, and let the syrup flow!

name: Temanava
description: TEMANAVA is an Adventure/Exploration game where you play as a co-pilot who survived a crash. You will have to learn an unknown language in order to communicate with strange islanders and use your mysterious powers to find your commander!

name: Catching Spirits
description: Catching Spirits, the 2D brawler game that will break the balance in your friendship. Launch yourself into a frantic 3-player chase and fight to defend the colors of one of the three great Tribes of Creation, Destruction or Preservation. Welcome to the fight!!!

name: Goat's Tale 2: Plus
description: More challenges await our brave goat, and only with your help will he be able to conquer them!

name: Chaos Saw
description: Your task is to rotate the platform and not to get under the saws

name: Justice Seeker: Unsafe Data
description: On a strange night, Axel Zakon, a former police detective and now Private Detective, is specifically requested by the police to aid them in the investigation of a homicide, with some unknown and mysterious reason behind this request.

name: Hot Coffe Shop
description: Unlock a total of 20 (animated and static) images through combat with other girls! You must withstand the largest number of waves, the further you get, the better the reward will be!

name: Bone Dust
description: Enter the nightmare circus in Bone Dust, a skill-based arena bullet hell. With fast-paced, arcade-style gameplay and epic boss battles, you'll battle against horrendous enemies using your playing cards as a weapon. Put your skills to the test and conquer the global leaderboard!

name: Uplife
description: Start your own business empire from nothing and become richest man in the world!

name: Kyoutabi
description: Travel the land of Ryuusei, meet new companions and defeat an evil organisation together. Kyoutabi is an Indie ARPG that will take you on a new journey filled with hardship and contentment. Follow Kyoko as she defeats Zenith in story mode, or go online and play together with other adventurers!

name: Backrooms: No Return
description: Explore the poolrooms in a inmersive cooperative horror game. Immerse yourself in the story of scientists who are exploring the depths of the poolrooms and end up encountering various obstacles in order to find a way back to reality.

name: Final Remedy
description: You wake up in an unfamiliar snowy place, you don't know how you got there and you don't remember who you are. Find out the mystery, avoid or defeat the enemies and escape...Atmospheric, story-rich, post apocalyptic walking simulator with puzzle elements and crafting mechanics.

name: IsoChess
description: Play chess online, vs AI, or vs a local player in our clean 2D and 2.5D chess game.

name: Ravva and the Phantom Library
description: Escape the Phantom Library! Embark into worlds of fantastic books haunted by dangerous ghosts, but you're not alone! Join Ravva and 4 unusual companions in this pixel-art platformer in cute dark-fantasy visuals! Can you face this challenge?

name: Power Sink
description: Power Sink is a Puzzle-Platformer, set in the depths of an underwater hydrothermal power plant. Explore and repair the station before it falls to pieces from the pressure of the sea and the heat from below.

name: Drift With Your Pals
description: Drift With Your Pals is a casual car drifting game with online multiplayer lobbies.

name: Don't die in space!
description: Welcome to our sci-fi space adventure, where players take on the roles of a crew aboard a spaceship as they work together to survive in the vast and dangerous universe.

name: Samurai Sword Stage
description: Samurai Sword Stage is a cool and simple samurai action game. Kill 100 enemies with your stylish swordsmanship.

name: Mechaneer Resta's Grand Adventure
description: One day, the robots around town lose control and start running amok. It's up to Resta and her good friend Curie to identify the source of the disturbance and save everyone!

name: Autopanic Zero
description: Autopanic Zero is a minimalist twinstick shooter survival game. A quick 10 minute fun.

name: The Risen Survival
description: "The Risen Survival" is a fast-paced game that challenges players to gather resources, craft items, and build shelter in order to survive against all odds. Can you outlast the competition and emerge as the ultimate survivor?

name: Mister Furry
description: Entertaining Arcade Game, consisting of a Series of Exciting Mini-Games with the Beautiful Furry Boys. Amazing Atmosphere, Great Music, 58 Levels with Full HD Furry Artworks. Join us!

name: Iaido
description: Iaido is a VR First-Person Action Game. The core gameplay is the animate iaido lash simulation. You will fight the enemies with your katana and sheath, Dodge and block the attack of enemies precisely and use iaido slash in the dedicatedly moment is the most fun part of the game.

name: Dirty Dirty Pirates
description: Ahoy! Dirty Dirty Pirates is a chaotic, local multiplayer fighting game, set in a looped battleground of madness.

name: Gridlocke
description: Gridlocke is a roguelike deckbuilder tactics game. Choose a faction and guide them to victory against the enemy's armies using a combination of careful deckbuilding, strategical placement, and resource management.

name: The Last Job
description: What seemed like an easy job, descends into something horrifying. Explore mysterious house, that holds dark secrets, in this first person horror experience.

name: Project Regolith
description: Work together with a friend to solve a series of challenging non-Euclidean Escape Room-esque puzzles whilst exploring Outpost Rhea, a space station on the far reaches of Human-explored space where the crew has vanished under mysterious circumstances...

name: Machigatta Shain-Kyouiku Mattaku Kimi no Kaisha de ha Ittai Donna Shain-Kyouiku wo
description: Sin descripción

name: Survive the Orcs
description: Slay thousands of pesky orcs and survive as much as you can! Survive the Orcs is an Action fantasy game with Roguelike elements. Create the ultimate build to survive the hordes. Explore the map to find extra power, unlock environmental sites & annihilate everything in your path!

name: Labyrinth of Light
description: Labyrinth of Light is a first-person puzzle game with platforming elements. The player can walk on any illuminated wall. Through a giant concrete maze in the Brutalist style, the player saves a withering tree.

name: Aeolus Fighter
description: "Aeolus Fighter" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Anti-Sane
description: You are lost in scary and beautiful universe. Try to stay sane among weird creatures and mysterious places.

name: Pata
description: This is a tower climbing game, which emphasizes strategy.

name: Ozymandias: The Andes
description: Including a new map: The Andes!

name: Antique Restorer
description: Repair antique vases, plates, statues and follow a young restorer's journey as they become a master of their trade.

name: Battle for Borders
description: The purpose of the game is to demonstrate the military weapons of different countries and their use in combat conditions.

name: Soar
description: Soar through the mountains at breakneck speeds. Experience the thrill of adrenaline as you maneuver through canyons and fly over majestic peaks.

name: Christmas Night
description: Christmas Night is a story-themed horror game about Christmas and its beliefs. Will we be rewarded for being a good girl this Christmas or will we be punished for being a spoiled person?

name: DeIz
description: A short visual novel about a high-school boy admiring an indie film director who attends the same school as him. Will he be able to tell her his true feelings? Or just screw up and continue to stalk her like what he always do? Either way, he's not a lady's man to run his love life smoothly.

name: Rwby: Vale of Darkness
description: Sin descripción

name: Kroniki Elevena
description: Sin descripción

name: A Dragon Named Coal
description: Sin descripción

name: Glitch in the System
description: Sin descripción

name: Who I See
description: A second-person mystery point-and-click, in which the story is told through the NPCs describing the strange actions of your strange main character.

name: Art-O-Ween: Night at the Gallery
description: Spooky Playdate Adventure Game

name: FMV Horror Bundle
description:
An online interpreter is tricked into reading an ancient book that summons a demon into her home. Night Book is an interactive psychological thriller with supernatural elements and branching storylines.

After the unexpected death of a close friend, Kristina returns to her hometown looking for answers, only to unearth a string of dark secrets. The truth turns out to be far more harrowing than she could have imagined. I Saw Black Clouds is an interactive psychological thriller with supernatural elements and branching storylines.

The Bunker is an award-winning interactive psychological horror movie. You are John, born underground the day the bombs fell, now alone and trying to survive. But when an alarm goes off, a catastrophic chain of events begins. Unlock the dark secrets of your past as you try to escape The Bunker.

name: Advance Wars
description: Lead a cast of colorful characters in fun, turn-based battles with two classic campaigns.

name: Ghost Wiper
description: Sin descripción

name: Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising
description: Ten-hut! It’s time for basic training on the Advance Wars 1+2: Re-Boot Camp game! Guide your units in tactical, turn-based battles, find the CO Power that best fits your playstyle, and defend your HQ from opposing nations.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Hashiwokakero
description: "Hashiwokakero" is a puzzle in which the numbers resemble islands, through which you draw lines resembling bridges. You have to take the entire board into consideration while progressing piece by piece. You do need to pay attention for this puzzle, but it can be solved smoothly and nicely.

name: Launcher Heroes
description: Launcher Heroes is a tactical, artillery, party game where you try to knock your opponents off the world. Use an assortment of items such as bombs, rockets, and jetpacks to help you navigate and destroy the terrain.

name: Lost Pyramid
description: Sin descripción

name: Bridge to Another World: Secrets of the Nutcracker
description: Something is terribly wrong in the toy world, and only you can help!

name: Maze
description: Maze is a First Person Puzzle Adventure game. Solve puzzles, collect coins, and escape mind blowing labyrinths. Over 30 Mazes to conquer! Solve Mazes alone or race against a friend to the finish in Multiplayer Mode! Go for the high score in Arcade Mode, a timed mode in which you race through Stages trying to collect all the coins before time runs out!

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Underwater
description: Dive into the Marvels of Underwater Wonders!

name: Effy: One of Unreasonable "If"
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Simulator Classic: Euro BR 159 Electro-Diesel Loco
description: Get up to speed dual-mode style with RSSLO’s striking Euro BR 159 Electro-Diesel!

name: Horror Night: The Slenderman Takings
description: The most famous creepypasta has finally arrived to Horror Night's universe, to hunt all survivors down in a much more terrifying new map: The Forest. Play with your friends against an AI Slenderman, while trying to solve multiple puzzles to escape.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Dragons
description: Dragons, drakes, wyrms and wyverns. While the great beasts have passed into myth and legend, some doubt that they are fully extinct...

name: Paper Drifter
description: Manage your power ups to make it to the end of the level as fast as you can!

name: Detective Rosie Morgan: Death at a Dinner Party
description: When a famous Human Rights Lawyer dies under mysterious circumstances in her Sevenoaks mansion, Detective Inspector Rosie Morgan and her team of indefatigable investigators are called on the scene to find out who murdered the barrister and why.

name: Mental: The Dark Night
description: Mental is a Single and Multiplayer psychological horror game, with varied story modes and contracts. The main idea of Mental is to offer the best visual and sound experience, so that you immerse yourself in an immersive experience that is as realistic as possible.

name: Immoral Shadows
description: Immoral Shadows gathers the best 16 fighters around, showcasing their fighting abilities in 8 different stages and across 12 different game modes.

name: Tichi3D
description: Tichi3D is a short, low poly 3D platformer which follows Tichi through a variety of locations while following a light narrative leading to a large scale fight against a constant looming presence. Run and jump through the worlds while collecting crystals and going for the best possible time.

name: Phantom Zone Daimons
description: Just a few toes into the future. Yomori-shi, a town full of strange happenings. And Ayamu Jinnai is just an ordinary girl. Except that she is a powerful medium and has the ability to see spirits. She and her occult-enthusiast sister, Makoto, are determined to fight the bizarre.

name: Top Race
description: Top Race - Racing simulator with a top view, executed in 2.5d, where the player fights against computer AI, participates in races with beautiful music!

name: Street Basket Challenge
description: This is an original 2-on-2 basketball game in SD style, with charismatic characters, and a game system based on the classic arcade beat 'em up.

name: Kaitou Tantei Blonde Lady
description: The Phantom Thief Detective Blonde Lady" is a girlslove novel and platformer 2Daction game in which a beautiful thief and a detective fight and get along with each other! Control the thief to wade through traps, steal treasure chests, and escape from the detective who is closing in on you!

name: Trojan
description: Trojan is a stealth game in which you have to extract a file from a damaged system. Sneak through the levels and avoid enemy attacks to get the file and finish the level.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: OMDB Airport
description: IATA: DXB, ICAO: OMDB - Dubai International is now one of the busiest international airports in the world. Developed by FeelThere for Tower! Simulator 3 as one of the first non US airport to be released.

name: Vampire Family
description: “Vampire Family” is an adult visual novel with multiple routes.

name: Greenlander
description: A brutal top-down action game set in a gloomy Medieval Greenland.

name: Evorevo
description: Biodiversity breeds beauty and conflict. On Earth, on the next planet. This is a story of longing and deep thinking for coexistence. and the planet on which this story unfolds... an overturned new century RPG, Evorevo.

name: Glory & Miserable Survivors DX
description: Each heroine is a strong warrior in a different branch of the military, and she alone can hold off the approaching armies. What awaits the heroines is either a great victory or a desperate disaster...

name: We the People
description: The Year is 2028. You are a Survivor, one of the few left amongst the living dead. You must Fight to Survive in this Hardcore Shooter based in Post-Apocalyptic America. Will you help to rebuild humanity, or take what they've gathered for yourself? We The People refuse to go quietly into the night!

name: Vaccine Rebirth
description: Enter once again into the world of Survival Horror.

name: Sehoni Island: Monsters and Adventures
description: Breed your monster and influence the outcome of a breeding with mutators. To gather the components needed to craft these mutators you can farm, forage, fish, trade and go on adventures.

name: Mr.Wise
description: Mr. Wise is an adventure visual novel with multiple endings. The events in the game revolve around two archaeology professors and their unlikely discovery which can re-write the history itself. But Mr. Wise has another plans for their plans.

name: Exorcist 2: Crow Magic
description: Are you ready to witness the adventure of the Exorcist, a master of magic and exorcism, and exorcise the most powerful dark being, the crow demon?

name: Inside Us
description: Inside us is a cooperative survival horror game for up to 4 players. Plunge into the world of nightmares, gather your friends and find the courage to extract as much Nightmare Essence as possible during this terrifying escape. Remember that not everyone share the same goal.

name: Last Dawn
description: Last Dawn is a short first-person atmospheric exploration game set in the year 2082. You will explore an open world map, hide from guards, and find a way to escape.
